programme.title: The Recruit
Kill Bill
Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc:
The Recruit: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Al Pacino, Colin Farrell, Bridget Moynahan, Gabriel Macht. A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0292506/","name":"The Recruit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MDMzOTk3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNTE0NTg2._V1_.jpg","description":"A brilliant young CIA trainee is asked by his mentor to help find a mole in the Agency.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0292506/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"UACW"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ambiguous?","reviewBody":"Ironic this movie's made by Spyglass? Or is it? Isn't there ambiguity there as well?

Nothing is what it seems.

Yes the writers could have gone over their screenplay and given it another one-two and that may have raised the caliber another notch, but this is still good entertainment. It won't change your life, but it will be a well spent couple of hours.

And it's true the movie could in theory have had a more sophisticated (ambiguous) ending, but there comes a time, after wading through all the trollop on the market, that one just sinks back and decides to enjoy a better movie for all it's worth.

And this is such a movie: directed by the capable Roger Donaldson who directed the taut thriller No Way Out and co-authored by a writer on The Natural, this one keeps going at a brisk pace with excellent editing and super soundtrack from Klaus Badelt of POTC1 fame. Farrell - who actually comes off smaller than life what with all the tripe written about him, and that's not a bad thing - and former fashion model Moynahan make the sparks fly. You feel for the protagonists and that's an essential ingredient of any good movie.

But Pacino: he's great at whatever he does but is he fated to have secondary roles now? Bah.

There's a bit of a 'Spy Game' feel to things but there's no shameless copying going on. There just aren't many movies in this genre. And Spy Game doesn't have the thrill and suspense this one has. Yes, you might eventually figure everything out before the denouement, but you won't be upset. And odds are you won't figure everything out anyway - some yes; all of it - no.

As for that ending: some people would perhaps prefer more ambiguity. On several planes. Others would say the ending is ambiguous enough. At least on one plane, perhaps several.

Nothing is what it seems."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":132914,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2003-04-30","keywords":"recruit,training,watching tv,jefferson memorial,smithsonian institute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Recruit","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi499253529","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDlhYTM4ZWItOTE3OC00ZjVkLWI0OWMtOTUxZGIxMDljZGU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2 Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268199/","name":"Colin Farrell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002044/","name":"Roger Donaldson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049348/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031181/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166202/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870013/","name":"Roger Towne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322248/","name":"Mitch Glazer"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Kiler-ów 2-óch: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Janusz Rewinski, Jerzy Stuhr. Jurek Kiler (see the prequel to this movie, "Kiler") has become a VIP - sponsoring the Polish government, playing tennis with the President, and stuff. He must oversee a transfer of a substantial amount of gold. However, in his past activities, he has made enemies. Mighty ones. programme.title: Na strajk!
programme.desc: Dzień z życia 19-letniego Karola, który opiekuje się dziadkiem chorym na alzheimera. Niebawem chłopak poznaje tajemnicę rodzinną związaną z dramatycznymi wydarzeniami podczas stoczniowych strajków w grudniu 1970 roku. Odkryta przeszłość zmusza go do podjęcia najważniejszej decyzji w życiu.

credits.actor: Jadwiga Jankowska-Cieślak
Witold Dębicki
Jan Peszek
Jędrzej Wielecki

programme.title: Jestem tutaj
programme.desc: Niespodziewany przyjazd młodszego brata Stefana (Miłosz Frydrychowicz) zmusza dwudziestoletnią Hanię (Marianna Kowalewska) do zmierzenia się z trudną przeszłością i do odnowy kontaktu z dawno niewidzianą matką. Przez wzgląd na chłopaka dziewczyna musi dać szansę tej skomplikowanej relacji.

programme.title: Dolapo jest OK
Dọlápọ̀ Is Fine
programme.desc: Wielka Brytania. Młoda czarnoskóra kobieta ma wkrótce zakończyć naukę w szkole z internatem i wkroczyć na rynek pracy. Spotyka się z presją, by zmienić nazwisko oraz swoją naturalną fryzurę.

programme.title: Hi, How Are You
programme.desc: Bezrobotny pięćdziesięcioletni Sławek (Jacek Poniedziałek) ma problem z zabiciem wolnego czasu. Mężczyzna przesiaduje w domu bądź włóczy się po osiedlu, szukając zaginionego kota. W najlepszym razie wykonuje różnego rodzaju prace zlecone mu przez żonę. Pewnego dnia Sławek poznaje tajemniczą sąsiadkę Kamilę (Maja Szopa). Kobieta zaprasza go do swojego ogrodu.

credits.actor: Jacek Poniedziałek
Maja Szopa

Arkadiusz Brykalski
Monika Kwiatkowska
Witold Dębicki
Jacek Domański

programme.title: Kiler
Kiler
programme.desc: Kiler: Directed by Juliusz Machulski. With Cezary Pazura, Malgorzata Kozuchowska, Jerzy Stuhr, Janusz Rewinski. An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. Soon, he is sprung by a mob boss who needs "Killer" for a few more jobs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0127626/","name":"Kiler","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDRkNWMxYWEtODUwMC00ZDRjLWI0MmQtMjFjNTFiMDYwZDZiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjExODE1MDc@._V1_.jpg","description":"An innocent cab driver Jurek Kiler is mistaken for a contract killer and imprisoned. programme.title: The Rossellinis
Klan Rossellinich
The Rossellinis
programme.desc:
The Rossellinis: Directed by Alessandro Rossellini, Lorenzo d'Amico de Carvalho. With Alessandro Rossellini, Isabella Rossellini, Renzo Rossellini, Roberto Rossellini. This documentary recounts the lives of Roberto Rossellini's children from the perspective of Alessandro Rossellini, the first grandson of the director." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12749696/","name":"The Rossellinis","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkxOTA1YzItNmIzNS00OGM1LTk5NmEtYmE3YWQwY2E4MTA1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ0MjA3Njk@._V1_.jpg","description":"This documentary recounts the lives of Roberto Rossellini's children from the perspective of Alessandro Rossellini, the first grandson of the director.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12749696/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nickrogers1969"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fascinating to watch","reviewBody":"This is a very interesting documentary about a big and famous family. The director, who is a grandchild of Roberto Rosselini, has made a loving portrait of his aunts and uncles. The director seems to be a nice and warm person and he has much love for his family living across the world.

My observations about the family after having watched it is that Ingrid Bergman's daughter Ingrid Rosselini is the true beauty of the family. Elletra, Isabella's daughter, would not be working as a model if it were not for her famous mother. The scene with Isabella modelling on the runway with her children is lame.

The scenes of the director with his mother were the most touching in the film and is what stays with me. There seems to be a warm close bond between them despite them not having seen each other for years. Those scenes were the most hopeful and intimate.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Documentary","Biography","History"],"datePublished":"2020-10-26","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000618/","name":"Isabella Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744022/","name":"Renzo Rossellini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5030454/","name":"Lorenzo d'Amico de Carvalho"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0258681/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066197/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0312397/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3324087/","name":"Andrea Paolo Massara"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1529407/","name":"Alessandro Rossellini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3309810/","name":"Davis Simanis Jr."}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Frailty
Ręka Boga
Frailty
programme.desc:
Frailty: Directed by Bill Paxton. With Bill Paxton, Matthew McConaughey, Powers Boothe, Matt O'Leary. A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0264616/","name":"Frailty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIxNTE2MTY1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODYyMTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0264616/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmverville"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Genuinely Good Film","reviewBody":"The film is very complete in what it is, keeping one continuously interested with the flashbacks to childhood and growing up with such a bizarre father, and interspersing it with the tails of serial murder, one simply cannot go wrong. The very plot in itself, the very story and essence of the film, is entertaining. It is the sort of story that the director (Bill Paxton) could do so much with, and in this case, he really did do a lot with it.

From beginning to end you are kept anticipating more and more about what is happening and where the film is going, and the creativity that is behind this story is first class. I felt as if this film was exquisitely done from start to finish, and one of those rare gems that seemed to be without any boring lulls -- the action flowing neatly, quickly, and tightly from one scene to the next. 

It demonstrates just how far people can go: so as to do such horrible things to their loved ones, and to do such acts of evil, in the name of 'God' when they are disillusioned as in this case. It also is sometimes interesting in its' twists & takes on the concept of morality as a whole.

Overall, this is the sort of film that one easily overlooks, but I would recommend you to not do likewise and to check this film out -- it is very much so worth your time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81446,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-04-12","keywords":"plot twist,fbi agent,demon,religious fanatic,rose garden","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew McConaughey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000959/","name":"Powers Boothe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057460/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020377/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018947/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360062/","name":"Brent Hanley"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0264616, Title: Frailty, --- Description: Frailty: Directed by Bill Paxton. With Bill Paxton, Matthew McConaughey, Powers Boothe, Matt O'Leary. A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0264616/","name":"Frailty","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTIxNTE2MTY1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwODYyMTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious man arrives at the offices of an FBI agent and recounts his childhood: how his religious fanatic father received visions telling him to destroy people who were in fact "demons."","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0264616/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jmverville","dateCreated":"2004-12-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Genuinely Good Film","reviewBody":"The film is very complete in what it is, keeping one continuously interested with the flashbacks to childhood and growing up with such a bizarre father, and interspersing it with the tails of serial murder, one simply cannot go wrong. The very plot in itself, the very story and essence of the film, is entertaining. It is the sort of story that the director (Bill Paxton) could do so much with, and in this case, he really did do a lot with it.

From beginning to end you are kept anticipating more and more about what is happening and where the film is going, and the creativity that is behind this story is first class. I felt as if this film was exquisitely done from start to finish, and one of those rare gems that seemed to be without any boring lulls -- the action flowing neatly, quickly, and tightly from one scene to the next. 

It demonstrates just how far people can go: so as to do such horrible things to their loved ones, and to do such acts of evil, in the name of 'God' when they are disillusioned as in this case. It also is sometimes interesting in its' twists & takes on the concept of morality as a whole.

Overall, this is the sort of film that one easily overlooks, but I would recommend you to not do likewise and to check this film out -- it is very much so worth your time.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81446,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-04-12","keywords":"plot twist,fbi agent,demon,religious fanatic,rose garden","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew McConaughey","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000959/","name":"Powers Boothe"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057460/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020377/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018947/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0360062/","name":"Brent Hanley"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jestem tutaj
programme.desc: Niespodziewany przyjazd młodszego brata Stefana (Miłosz Frydrychowicz) zmusza dwudziestoletnią Hanię (Marianna Kowalewska) do zmierzenia się z trudną przeszłością i do odnowy kontaktu z dawno niewidzianą matką. Przez wzgląd na chłopaka dziewczyna musi dać szansę tej skomplikowanej relacji.

credits.actor: Marianna Kowalewska
Miłosz Frydrychowicz
Edyta Torhan
Michał Jaros

programme.title: Na strajk!
programme.desc: Dzień z życia 19-letniego Karola, który opiekuje się dziadkiem chorym na alzheimera. Niebawem chłopak poznaje tajemnicę rodzinną związaną z dramatycznymi wydarzeniami podczas stoczniowych strajków w grudniu 1970 roku. Odkryta przeszłość zmusza go do podjęcia najważniejszej decyzji w życiu.

credits.actor: Jadwiga Jankowska-Cieślak
Witold Dębicki
Jan Peszek
Jędrzej Wielecki

programme.title: We mnie
programme.desc: Sandra (Małgorzata Gorol) świętuje swój wieczór panieński. Zbliża się dzień ślubu, ale przedtem musi poddać się aborcji - płód ma wady genetyczne. Do szpitala jedzie z nią narzeczony. Z każdą kolejną minutą mężczyzna wydaje się Sandrze coraz bardziej obcy. Po zabiegu kobieta postanawia szczerze z nim porozmawiać.

programme.title: Wehikuł czasu - DeLorean
programme.desc: Uznawane obecnie za kultowe sportowe auto DeLorean DMC-12 zasłynęło jako pojazd służący do podróżowania w czasie w filmowej trylogii "Powrót do przyszłości". Twórcy dokumentu pokazują, jak zespół złożony z mechaników samochodowych i wielbicieli kina odtwarza - śrubka po śrubce - ten znany na całym świecie samochód, którym Marty McFly przenosił się z dekady w dekadę.

programme.title: The Verdict
Werdykt
The Verdict
programme.desc:
The Verdict: Directed by Sidney Lumet. With Paul Newman, Charlotte Rampling, Jack Warden, James Mason. An outcast, alcoholic Boston lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084855/","name":"The Verdict","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5MzMwMzAzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjYyMjA0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An outcast, alcoholic Boston lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084855/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Don-102"},"dateCreated":"1999-03-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Newman amazing as drunken lawyer in story of redemption...","reviewBody":"The title of this movie is deceiving. THE VERDICT suggests a courtroom drama, something like TO KILL A MOCKINGBIRD, or INHERIT THE WIND. It does have some riveting court scenes, but what happens outside of court and to Paul Newman is the real attraction here. The title not only refers to the inevitable decision of the important case of the film, but also to how the Newman character is going to live the rest of his life. Should he sell out and take the easy settlement, or take the highly regarded archdiocese of Boston to court for real justice. These are the questions Newman must face in this profound drama that seems more like a picture of the 70's than an 80's film.

Director Sidney Lumet has dealt with the legal system before in his first film, 12 ANGRY MEN. He takes it to a more personal level and Paul Newman, one of the finest actors of the past 40 years, is the person to do it. He is a legend and he bares his soul as attorney Frank Galvin, a lonely, corrupt drunk whose license to practice law is hanging by a thread. Jack Warden plays his trusty assistant who gets him a case that could help Frank change his life. Warden, however, has had enough.

Newman plays an excellent drunk, even cracking an egg into an 8am beer to start his day. This is a dim looking movie, shot during a cold winter in Boston. There are no great shots, or even any emotionally-rousing speeches, but this is Lumet's style. It is plodding and we see into the life of a lawyer on the ropes. James Mason is perfect as the slimy defense lawyer. Newman is constantly underestimated because of past failures. He is a drunk, but he still has some tricks up his sleeve.

NOTE: Look closely at the closing argument given by Newman. In the background, you can glimpse a then-unknown Bruce Willis.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":38479,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"1982-12-17","keywords":"reference to arizona,legal drama,law career,catholic hospital,implied sex","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Verdict","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi637272345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJlMTFkNTUtODhkYS00NmQxLWIwZmItODQ0YjdkNDM2ZDVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWJlMTFkNTUtODhkYS00NmQxLWIwZmItODQ0YjdkNDM2ZDVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001648/","name":"Charlotte Rampling"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0912001/","name":"Jack Warden"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001486/","name":"Sidney Lumet"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0715312/","name":"Barry Reed"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000519/","name":"David Mamet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0696319/","name":"Jay Presson Allen"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sauver ou périr
Ocalić i zginąć
Sauver ou périr
programme.desc: Sauver ou périr: Directed by Frédéric Tellier. With Pierre Niney, Anaïs Demoustier, Vincent Rottiers, Chloé Stefani. The heartbreaking hero's journey and true story of a Paris fireman, husband and dad." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7210426/","name":"Sauver ou périr","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWFhZWMzNWItMGNkYi00ZTlkLTgxZGQtOTVlOTJlMDU1MzZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"The heartbreaking hero's journey and true story of a Paris fireman, husband and dad.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7210426/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ronevickers"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Memorable & Emotional Film.","reviewBody":"This is a quite magnificent film on so many counts. Inspired by true events, this story of the human spirit, overcoming all the odds, will remain long in the memory. Everything about it is top notch - direction, cinematography, script and, most of all, the acting. All play their parts exceptionally well, with Pierre Niney in the lead role being particularly outstanding. His range of emotions, in a difficult part, dominate the film, and he confirms the fact that he is a brilliant actor. This is a must see movie for anyone who appreciates film making at its best.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1298,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-11-28","keywords":"fireman,fire,fireman training,building on fire,fire fight","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2670312217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiM2I3YjEtNjY2MC00MjA4LTg1MzYtNGJjN2ZmNmNkYTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWNiM2I3YjEtNjY2MC00MjA4LTg1MzYtNGJjN2ZmNmNkYTY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2582755/","name":"Pierre Niney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1326732/","name":"Anaïs Demoustier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1196219/","name":"Vincent Rottiers"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1595335/","name":"Frédéric Tellier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0536467/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0261946/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044140/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1190532/","name":"David Oelhoffen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1595335/","name":"Frédéric Tellier"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nine to Five
Od dziewiątej do piątej
Nine to Five
programme.desc:
Nine to Five: Directed by Colin Higgins. With Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Dolly Parton, Dabney Coleman. Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0080319/","name":"Nine to Five","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmVkMDZhZmUtNmIxMy00YzY0LTg0NTUtYmViODJmMjU4ZDNjL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0080319/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"edwagreen"},"dateCreated":"2009-09-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"9 to 5-Work Was Never This Much Fun ***","reviewBody":"No question that this is a very funny movie thanks to the gifted performances of Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Dabney Coleman and Dolly Parton. Parton's Oscar worthy song 9 to 5 immediately captures a positive mood in this tale of 3 women who gang up on their miserable boss who has subjected them to sexism in every sense of the word.

The real surprise in this film is Fonda's performance. She goes from a woman who acts and dresses as if she is a spinster teacher to one who is quite hip.

There are some silly moments when the 3 women imagine how they will get rid of boss Dabney Coleman. The mix up at the hospital, though inane, is needed to keep the story going.

A wonderful film depicting the changes of roles of women in the workplace, changing conventional ways of doing things in the office, and a marvelous cat and mouse relationship made by the women and Coleman to get the goods on each other","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31138,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1980-12-19","keywords":"workplace,female protagonist,friendship between women,revenge against boss,1980s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi39173913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgwOGRmM2QtNzZlMS00OGJlLThmZWMtZDhhMjQ4MWY5ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODgwOGRmM2QtNzZlMS00OGJlLThmZWMtZDhhMjQ4MWY5ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000404/","name":"Jane Fonda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005499/","name":"Lily Tomlin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000573/","name":"Dolly Parton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383359/","name":"Colin Higgins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0059553/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0720334/","name":"Patricia Resnick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383359/","name":"Colin Higgins"}],"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Guest
Gość
The Guest
programme.desc:
The Guest: Directed by Adam Wingard. With Dan Stevens, Maika Monroe, Brendan Meyer, Sheila Kelley. A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2980592/","name":"The Guest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQyODc5MTAwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjMwMjA1MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2980592/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Leofwine_draca"},"dateCreated":"2016-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nice little horror/thriller combo","reviewBody":"THE GUEST is a fun, if derivative, little movie from Adam Wingard, the guy who also brought us the familiar-yet-entertaining YOU'RE NEXT. It's a belated addition to that whole psycho-thriller sub-genre of the 1990s in which ordinary families were menaced by mysterious forces, and it achieves plenty on what is clearly a tight budget.

There are shades of THE TERMINATOR and the BOURNE trilogy here and it has to be said that the story is simplistic and straightforward. The denouement will surprise nobody, for example. However, like DRIVE before it, THE GUEST is all about the execution. It looks cool, it looks stylish, and it sounds cool too thanks to that thumping soundtrack. Dan Stevens is excellent as the suave and sophisticated guy who turns up to make a few waves, and Maika Monroe shows some of the promise that she displayed in IT FOLLOWS. Plus we get Lance Reddick, being exceptionally good again after his turn in JOHN WICK.

In fact, THE GUEST has quite a lot in common with IT FOLLOWS, especially the horror-style unfolding of the plot. These films share likable young cast members and a fresh feel despite the familiarities of the situations in which the characters find themselves. Certainly nothing about THE GUEST is original, yet it's thoroughly entertaining at the same time. And that's all I need from a movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":97252,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-09-05","keywords":"psychopath,ex soldier,killing spree,bullying,grief","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2685905945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTk0ODk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTU5NjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwMTk0ODk0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTU5NjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1405398/","name":"Dan Stevens"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445992/","name":"Sheila Kelley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2140860/","name":"Maika Monroe"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417392/","name":"Adam Wingard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133023/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0188303/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1440023/","name":"Simon Barrett"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

The story of crime boss John Gotti and his son." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1801552/","name":"Gotti","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyODI1NDMxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDg0Njg0NTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of crime boss John Gotti and his son.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1801552/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Kirpianuscus"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"it could be...","reviewBody":"...a better film. But the chosen way to tell the story of Gotti is wrong. It becomes pathetic. John Travolta has, maybe in too much measure, the desire to give the role of his career and the result becomes almost pathetic. Something essential is missing for transform the subject in more than a pledge for a dark hero. Sure, like each film of good intentions, it is a good first step to discover the life and activity of John Gotti. But, after each indulgence nuance, it is clear - it could be a better film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14931,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-14","keywords":"gangster,crime lord,based on true story,terminal illness,funeral","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3662460953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDM1OGI5MDUtOGQ4MC00OTBlLTk1ZGUtZmM5NGM5Zjk5NmVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWVyZ3JlZW5l._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDM1OGI5MDUtOGQ4MC00OTBlLTk1ZGUtZmM5NGM5Zjk5NmVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWVyZ3JlZW5l._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of crime boss John Gotti and his son."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000237/","name":"John Travolta"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4901642/","name":"Spencer Rocco Lofranco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000593/","name":"Kelly Preston"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175305/","name":"Kevin Connolly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017712/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283547/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280560/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0744235/","name":"Leo Rossi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0229644/","name":"Lem Dobbs"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mimic
Mutant
Mimic
programme.desc:
Mimic: Directed by Guillermo del Toro. With Mira Sorvino, Jeremy Northam, Alexander Goodwin, Giancarlo Giannini. Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119675/","name":"Mimic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk4MjRkODctOTVjNS00MmI2LTg0Y2ItMWQyMzdkZDU3MzMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119675/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2002-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dark and atmospheric horror","reviewBody":"In New York a disease carried by cockroaches threatens to wipe out a whole generation of children. A scientist, Susan Tyler, breeds a new bug that mimics the cockroach and wipes out the disease. However years later something is living in New York's subways that looks human. Tyler suspects that her breed has not died out but has evolved to imitate it's natural predator - us. Her investigations into the subway lead her to more than she bargained for.

This is an atmospheric thriller from Guillermo del Toro, director of The Devil's Backbone and Cronos. He manages to mix great director with good old fashioned monster horror to great effect. The concept itself is clever, even if the idea of bugs evolving to look very like humans is a little far fetched. However, once the action moves to the subway the fact that the bugs are clearly lethal no matter what they look like, makes this less important. The film is quite short and makes the action come quicker and seem more urgent. Several people get killed by the bug that wouldn't usually get killed in this sort of horror (children for example), this is very effective as it is quite scary to see the unexpected happen.

The mood is dark throughout and Del Toro uses the sewers and subway to great effect, creating a real sense of claustrophobia - like the humans have entered the bug's world and not the other way round. The bugs are shown early on in the film - usually not a good idea (keep it hidden in the Jaws way), but here the special effects are good enough to make the bug really believable. However the horror is not in seeing the bugs but in they way they hunt and kill - the fear is in what could happen. That's why seeing them doesn't take anything away.

The cast are great, Sorvino especially is very good in the lead. Jeremy Northam and Charles S. Dutton are good in support and Abraham Murray adds a bit of cameo class (though his role is quite unnecessary). But the director is the real star adding some genuine scares and real mood to a film that could have easily been just another creature-feature that goes straight to video and straight to the back of your mind.

Overall a superior creature horror film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1997-08-22","keywords":"giant insect,insect,disease,entomologist,cockroach","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mimic","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3387923993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmMyYmE4YzktNWMwMy00NmVkLThiMDQtYTU0Yzc4OTc1N2IyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmMyYmE4YzktNWMwMy00NmVkLThiMDQtYTU0Yzc4OTc1N2IyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000227/","name":"Mira Sorvino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000562/","name":"Jeremy Northam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0329422/","name":"Alexander Goodwin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0938586/","name":"Donald A. IMDb data; ttnr: 0119675, Title: Mimic, --- Description: Mimic: Directed by Guillermo del Toro. With Mira Sorvino, Jeremy Northam, Alexander Goodwin, Giancarlo Giannini. Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119675/","name":"Mimic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk4MjRkODctOTVjNS00MmI2LTg0Y2ItMWQyMzdkZDU3MzMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler genetically created an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now, the insects are out to destroy their only predator, mankind.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119675/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo","dateCreated":"2002-01-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dark and atmospheric horror","reviewBody":"In New York a disease carried by cockroaches threatens to wipe out a whole generation of children. A scientist, Susan Tyler, breeds a new bug that mimics the cockroach and wipes out the disease. However years later something is living in New York's subways that looks human. Tyler suspects that her breed has not died out but has evolved to imitate it's natural predator - us. Her investigations into the subway lead her to more than she bargained for.

This is an atmospheric thriller from Guillermo del Toro, director of The Devil's Backbone and Cronos. He manages to mix great director with good old fashioned monster horror to great effect. The concept itself is clever, even if the idea of bugs evolving to look very like humans is a little far fetched. However, once the action moves to the subway the fact that the bugs are clearly lethal no matter what they look like, makes this less important. The film is quite short and makes the action come quicker and seem more urgent. Several people get killed by the bug that wouldn't usually get killed in this sort of horror (children for example), this is very effective as it is quite scary to see the unexpected happen.

The mood is dark throughout and Del Toro uses the sewers and subway to great effect, creating a real sense of claustrophobia - like the humans have entered the bug's world and not the other way round. The bugs are shown early on in the film - usually not a good idea (keep it hidden in the Jaws way), but here the special effects are good enough to make the bug really believable. However the horror is not in seeing the bugs but in they way they hunt and kill - the fear is in what could happen. That's why seeing them doesn't take anything away.

The cast are great, Sorvino especially is very good in the lead. Jeremy Northam and Charles S. Dutton are good in support and Abraham Murray adds a bit of cameo class (though his role is quite unnecessary). But the director is the real star adding some genuine scares and real mood to a film that could have easily been just another creature-feature that goes straight to video and straight to the back of your mind.

Overall a superior creature horror film.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":48689,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1997-08-22","keywords":"giant insect,insect,disease,entomologist,cockroach","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mimic","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3387923993","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmMyYmE4YzktNWMwMy00NmVkLThiMDQtYTU0Yzc4OTc1N2IyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmMyYmE4YzktNWMwMy00NmVkLThiMDQtYTU0Yzc4OTc1N2IyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000227/","name":"Mira Sorvino","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000562/","name":"Jeremy Northam","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0329422/","name":"Alexander Goodwin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0938586/","name":"Donald A. Wollheim","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0730422/","name":"Matthew Robbins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"],"duration":"PT1H45M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wpiekłowstąpieni e
programme.desc: Ambitna Kate (Azura Skye) pracuje jako agentka nieruchomości komercyjnych. Liczy, że uda jej się zawrzeć duży kontrakt z zamożnym menedżerem inwestycyjnym. Lukratywna transakcja niespodziewanie zmienia się w mrożącą krew w żyłach grę, kiedy kobieta, pan Browning (Bill Sage) oraz wszystkie inne zaangażowane w sprawę osoby wpadają w tajemniczą, a co gorsza nadprzyrodzoną pułapkę. Aby przeżyć, Kate musi odkryć kolejne wskazówki związane z przeszłością budynku.

programme.title: A Night in the Woods
A Night in the Woods
programme.desc:
A Night in the Woods: Directed by Richard Parry. With Scoot McNairy, Anna Skellern, Andrew Hawley. Brody, his girlfriend Kerry and their friend Leo go hiking in Dartmoor's Wistman's Woods, so named because of its legendary haunted past. That night jealousies, sexual tensions and strained relationships come to a head turning what should have been a peaceful camping adventure into a trip to terror. As collective paranoia reaches fever pitch it becomes clear that there is a much darker force at work in the ancient eerie surroundings. Who or what is after them? And can any one of them survive a night in the woods?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1718714/","name":"A Night in the Woods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2MjI1MzE1NTJeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDcyMjM5MTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brody, his girlfriend Kerry and their friend Leo go hiking in Dartmoor's Wistman's Woods, so named because of its legendary haunted past. That night jealousies, sexual tensions and strained relationships come to a head turning what s","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1718714/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Danny_G13"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Missed opportunity","reviewBody":"It all started with Blair Witch in '99. Since then, 'found footage' and 'handicam'-style films have become all the rage. There was the less-remembered 'Last Broadcast' which actually preceded Blair Witch but did not capture the imagination in the same way the viral marketing method pioneered by Haxan Films managed to. And since those early days, well-received efforts such as Cloverfield and Paranormal Activity have upped the budget but endeavoured to keep themselves to the same principles.

So, with these films now extremely common, it takes something a bit special to stand out. Sadly, nothing about 'A Night in the Woods' is special, and it blows several good chances to be a great film, instead ending up a bit of a mess of a production which could have been so much more.

The story sees 3 'friends' decide to go camping out in Dartmoor - the complete lack of explanation as to why they are going there is one mild flaw. A 'sinister' (contrived) element of risk is thrown in with a visit to an Irish pub and tales of horror from the area the intrepid 3 are aiming for. And after a very long and dragged-out first portion of the movie we finally end up on location for a night in the woods.

This film tries insanely hard to be Blair Witch, in Britain. Just like the earlier masterpiece it's 3 friends isolated in the woods with inexplicable evil apparently descending upon them. And to its credit it does manage to create a semblance of tension approaching the crescendo of the story.

But unfortunately the makers decided to throw in a whole bunch of bizarre red herrings which made no sense. They included revelatory back story but unfortunately none of it was remotely developed nor did it make any sense in context of the environment - it did not appear to affect anything.

They also included a few moments which were from the eyes of certain characters. The whole point of these films is you only ever see from the view of the camera they are holding. As soon as you get an eye-view from a character who has no camera, it doesn't work.

It was, as mentioned, also let horribly down by the unnecessarily long intro - the story took far too long to get going and created the criminal error of making every character dislikeable in the process.

That all said it is not the worst cam film I have ever seen, but it was poorly-conceived and lacked sense and cohesion. Its forced and contrived nature let it down horribly, even if the acting was actually half decent.

Seen much better.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":904,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2012-09-07","keywords":"woods,night,found footage,legend,camping","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.K. Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4160267545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4ODI2ODcxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ0NTkxOA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4ODI2ODcxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ0NTkxOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On what is intended to be a fun camping trip to investigate and to chill in the atmosphere of the legendary haunted past of DartmoorÂ’s WistmanÂ’s Woods, Brody, his girlfriend Kerry and her cousin Leo very soon find themselves mysteriously ill at ease both with their surroundings and their companions."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1058940/","name":"Scoot McNairy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1317154/","name":"Anna Skellern"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2959893/","name":"Andrew Hawley"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060017/","name":"Richard Parry"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113509/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060017/","name":"Richard Parry"}],"duration":"PT1H22M"}</script><metacontent="

This is beyond ridiculous. The whole thing seems like something produced by a couple of ten year olds. The "monster" is ... not scary. The acting lame. programme.title: Nemo
Był sobie sen
Nemo
programme.desc:
Nemo: Directed by Arnaud Sélignac. With Seth Kibel, Jason Connery, Mathilda May, Nipsey Russell. A young boy imagines being in a tale he's about to hear. In this magical world he encounters many famous characters from other tales, aliens and other beings and, of course, a beautiful princess." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087784/","name":"Nemo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NzIwMTgwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjIyMzMzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy imagines being in a tale he's about to hear. In this magical world he encounters many famous characters from other tales, aliens and other beings and, of course, a beautiful princess.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087784/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bexley-37529"},"dateCreated":"2015-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"An odd little arty film which you'll either hate or love.","reviewBody":"I first saw this film in 1985 and I liked it very much, it was written by Telsche Boorman daughter of director John Boorman, Who produced Dream One - Nemo. The story is an adaptation of "Little Nemo in Slumberland, by American cartoonist Winsor McCay. The special effects are a bit cheesy as you would expect in a low budget arty sort of film from the early 80s, But it has a great deal of charm. The story is dreamlike and childish, but it has a certain flare. I really liked Katrine Boorman's character the perpetually bored Countess Duchka. Also a very young and alarmingly ginger Charley Boorman is in this film. It's a shame that Jason Connery's film career didn't go very far, he looks the part in this, His acting in this? Well, I didn't hate it. Harvey Keitel plays it like well him!

I must say that Mathilda May's performance as Alice was a bit insipid, but she too looked the part. 

Nipsey Russell's Mr Rip, the Prospero magician character in Dream One could have been played a little more understated but he still came up with some profound moments. Dream One is an odd little arty film which you'll either hate or love, it resonated with me enough for me to buy the DVD and watch it again after 30 years.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0087784, Title: Nemo, --- Description: Nemo: Directed by Arnaud Sélignac. With Seth Kibel, Jason Connery, Mathilda May, Nipsey Russell. A young boy imagines being in a tale he's about to hear. In this magical world he encounters many famous characters from other tales, aliens and other beings and, of course, a beautiful princess." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087784/","name":"Nemo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2NzIwMTgwN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjIyMzMzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy imagines being in a tale he's about to hear. In this magical world he encounters many famous characters from other tales, aliens and other beings and, of course, a beautiful princess.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087784/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bexley-37529","dateCreated":"2015-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"An odd little arty film which you'll either hate or love.","reviewBody":"I first saw this film in 1985 and I liked it very much, it was written by Telsche Boorman daughter of director John Boorman, Who produced Dream One - Nemo. The story is an adaptation of "Little Nemo in Slumberland, by American cartoonist Winsor McCay. The special effects are a bit cheesy as you would expect in a low budget arty sort of film from the early 80s, But it has a great deal of charm. The story is dreamlike and childish, but it has a certain flare. I really liked Katrine Boorman's character the perpetually bored Countess Duchka. Also a very young and alarmingly ginger Charley Boorman is in this film. It's a shame that Jason Connery's film career didn't go very far, he looks the part in this, His acting in this? Well, I didn't hate it. Harvey Keitel plays it like well him!

I must say that Mathilda May's performance as Alice was a bit insipid, but she too looked the part. 

Nipsey Russell's Mr Rip, the Prospero magician character in Dream One could have been played a little more understated but he still came up with some profound moments. Dream One is an odd little arty film which you'll either hate or love, it resonated with me enough for me to buy the DVD and watch it again after 30 years.

Cary.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.8,"genre":["Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1984-12-12","keywords":"elevator,submarine,fairy tale,surrealism,sword and fantasy","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0452157/","name":"Seth Kibel","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001064/","name":"Jason Connery","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000528/","name":"Mathilda May"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845353/","name":"Arnaud Sélignac"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045569/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042201/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047305/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0845353/","name":"Arnaud Sélignac","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261260/","name":"Jean-Pierre Esquenazi","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0095579/","name":"Telsche Boorman"],"duration":"PT1H37M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ice Quake
Lodowe trzęsienie
Ice Quake
programme.desc:
Ice Quake: Directed by Paul Ziller. With Brendan Fehr, Holly Elissa, Jodelle Ferland, Ryan Grantham. A massive crack in the earth's crust threatens the world with deadly gas from the planet's core. It's up to a geologist and his family to battle ice geysers and avalanches to save mankind." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1657284/","name":"Ice Quake","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2ODA4NjYzMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODYxMTgwMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A massive crack in the earth's crust threatens the world with deadly gas from the planet's core. It's up to a geologist and his family to battle ice geysers and avalanches to save mankind.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1657284/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jimmerw"},"dateCreated":"2010-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ouch","reviewBody":"Awful, just bloody awful. It is difficult to decide what negative aspect of the movie to discuss as there were so may. In fact, I would speak of a positive aspect if I could find one.

I am a Canadian and cringe whenever I see that I am about to watch a Canadian movie as I have rarely seen one that did not leave me constantly saying "Oh, come on, really?" 

What bothers me the most is that movies such as these are funded, in part, by tax revenue in the form of government film grants. We have people living on the street, children going to bed hungry at night, and the government feels it is more beneficial to put money into dismal productions like this.

I am not one who turns off a movie once I start watching one. Perhaps I am a glutton for punishment as this movie (using the word loosely) left me feeling like I threw away the portion of my life that was devoted to watching this. It is as if it was a class project done by students from a high school film class.

I honestly do not understand how it is that people can produce a work like this and feel that it is good. Spend the money needed to create something of this calibre and release it on the unsuspecting public.

I seldom write reviews, but I am so tired of seeing my tax dollars going to make such horrible movies that I had to vent. If given the opportunity to watch this movie or scrub toilets in a subway station, go for the toilets. It will surely be far more rewarding and enjoyable.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1546,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-12-11","keywords":"methane,earthquake,helicopter,methane snow,avalanche","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ice Quake","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi445558041","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc0ODNkM2EtNzZkNi00ZDc0LTgxMDEtM2U5ZDU4YjBiZTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc0ODNkM2EtNzZkNi00ZDc0LTgxMDEtM2U5ZDU4YjBiZTFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Ice Quake"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0270451/","name":"Brendan Fehr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0226597/","name":"Holly Elissa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272706/","name":"Jodelle Ferland"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956484/","name":"Paul Ziller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0340242/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0712801/","name":"David Ray"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

Christmas Icetastrophe
programme.desc:
Christmas Icetastrophe: Directed by Jonathan Winfrey. With Victor Webster, Jennifer Spence, Richard Harmon, Tiera Skovbye. A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3993802/","name":"Christmas Icetastrophe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA4NTc4MzQzNDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE2NzA4NjUx._V1_.jpg","description":"A meteorite brings ice and freezing temperatures, which threatens to harm the residents of a small town at Christmas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3993802/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"siderite"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"I am afraid my condition has left me cold to this film","reviewBody":"It was very close to being so bad that it was fun to watch, but it lacked the necessary tongue in cheek or at least going over the top. In the end it was boring, really boring, while taking itself seriously. For something that doesn't make any sense, the film ran like its makers expected viewers to take it seriously as well.

For me the only notable thing was that the main cast was mostly taken from the Continuum TV show. Other than that everything was really silly, just not silly enough to entertain.

But that's just me. If you believe in meteor(ite)s that can lead to growing ice crystals that suck the heat from an area the size of a small town, while not interfering with the rest of the world climate, then this is the film for you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1381,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.8},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-12-20","keywords":"disaster film,meteorite,ice,small town,meteor","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005543/","name":"Victor Webster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817780/","name":"Jennifer Spence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2113653/","name":"Richard Harmon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934912/","name":"Jonathan Winfrey"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0496864/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2579139/","name":"David Sanderson"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pakt z diabłem
programme.desc: Przystojny Louis (Ethan Erickson) pracuje w znanym studiu fotograficznym prowadzonym przez Bae (Jennifer Nitsch). Jego urodę dostrzega menedżer Henry (Malcolm McDowell) i zaprasza go na sesję. Za jego namową chłopak przyjmuje pseudonim artystyczny Dorian, na cześć tytułowej postaci z powieści Oscara Wilde'a "Portret Doriana Graya". Zaczyna odnosić liczne sukcesy. Po kilku latach Louis odkrywa, że twarz na przedstawiającym go portrecie starzeje się zamiast niego, podobnie jak w książce.

Cabin Pressure
programme.desc: Cabin Pressure: Directed by Alan Simmonds. With Craig Sheffer, Rachel Hayward, Winston Rekert, Françoise Yip. A fully automated commercial jetliner is prepared to make its maiden voyage. Without an on-flight pilot, the craft relies on satellite linking for its course. But when the plane suddenly deviates from its determined route and establishes a circular pattern over Seattle, it becomes evident that the craft has been hijacked by a disgruntled former airline employee who has hacked into the flight's computer system from his apartment, somewhere in the United States. programme.title: Darkness Falls
Gdy zapada zmrok
Darkness Falls
programme.desc:
Darkness Falls: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Chaney Kley, Emma Caulfield Ford, Lee Cormie, Grant Piro. A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0282209/","name":"Darkness Falls","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjcwOGM4ZDUtOGFiZS00YTAxLWExMTQtMWQ1NGU2NTZjYjg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A vengeful spirit has taken the form of the Tooth Fairy to exact vengeance on the town that lynched her 150 years earlier. Her only opposition is the only child, now grown up, who has survived her before.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0282209/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LessThanPaddy"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Severe nightmares once upon a time...","reviewBody":"Okay, I admit this may not be a great movie, but I don't think it is the worst either. However, I do think I'm only saying that because I loved it as a kid. Honestly, it was always the choice of scary film for me and my friends at sleepovers etc. It was scary, the tooth-fairy character is my idea of a worst nightmare, and believe me she gave me plenty in the years that followed. I haven't seen it in a few years and while it may not haunt me anymore I suspect it would give me an intermediate shiver if I watched it again today.

Usually I bash films like this. There are probably better horror films out there that I've given worse reviews too, but this one holds sentimental value for me and I genuinely believe that it's not THAT bad. The acting isn't wonderful and the story plays out a bit predictably... I still quite like the premise though and the legend behind Matilda the tooth-fairy.

If you scare easily, I wouldn't recommend you watch this alone. The movie might not be top, but it is full of jumps and the villain is horrifying. Enjoy (with the lights on).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31282,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Fantasy","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-05-21","keywords":"tooth fairy,darkness,night terrors,fear of the dark,supernatural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Darkness Falls","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3634364697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0YTA0YzEtZTcyMS00YmI2LTkyZDEtNzg0MWYxZmUyZmJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTc0YTA0YzEtZTcyMS00YmI2LTkyZDEtNzg0MWYxZmUyZmJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1015096/","name":"Chaney Kley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146536/","name":"Emma Caulfield Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1112328/","name":"Antony Burrows"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022564/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364899/","name":"Joe Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004591/","name":"John Fasano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0888743/","name":"James Vanderbilt"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cop Car
Radiowóz
Cop Car
programme.desc:
Cop Car: Directed by Jon Watts. With Kevin Bacon, James Freedson-Jackson, Hays Wellford, Camryn Manheim. A small-town sheriff sets out to find the two kids who have taken his car on a joy ride." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3813310/","name":"Cop Car","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NjA2ODY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzYwODA1NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small-town sheriff sets out to find the two kids who have taken his car on a joy ride.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3813310/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"A_Different_Drummer"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"bizarre entry in the "real time" category","reviewBody":"While many films use the device of a "real time" narrative for effect (ie, where the viewer is given the sense that he/she is a participant in real time in the story) very few films run the device for the full length.

For example, the Bourne films went into real time when the main character was on screen, but otherwise maintained a traditional narrative. Examples of standout real-time films would include Tom Cruise (amazing) in COLLATERAL; Dennis Weaver in DUEL; and the Canadian sci-fi epic, CUBE.

So now that you know first-rate films CAN potentially be made using the technique, the writer/director of this film (to be kind) did not set his sights quite that high.

Overall, it is not a bad film, it is incredibly engaging given how little is actually going on. However, while all films require a suspension of disbelief, the overall problem with COP CAR is that the two lead characters, boys of about ten years of age, are written as the dumbest children ever to appear in a feature film.

Seriously. In an age where even the Disney channel attributes 'tude, street cred, smarts and fast moves to 7 year olds (ask your child if you don't believe me) these two characters as written are so far removed from coherent thought that the audience starts to wonder if they escaped from "special class." To use the term "pig stupid" for these kids effectively slanders the pig.

Bacon is excellent. Would like to see more of him in features.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32046,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-07","keywords":"sheriff,stealing a car,police car,child uses a gun,child with a gun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Cop Car","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3722164761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2NjNDdjNTctZTQ0Mi00NDRjLTljN2EtYjU4N2I0YWZjOWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2NjNDdjNTctZTQ0Mi00NDRjLTljN2EtYjU4N2I0YWZjOWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Cop Car"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6627667/","name":"James Freedson-Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4881741/","name":"Hays Wellford"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1218281/","name":"Jon Watts"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0424445/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0422626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0541701/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1218281/","name":"Jon Watts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1755986/","name":"Christopher Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12754932/","name":"Kaden Selvidge"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 3813310, Title: Cop Car, --- Description: Cop Car: Directed by Jon Watts. With Kevin Bacon, James Freedson-Jackson, Hays Wellford, Camryn Manheim. A small-town sheriff sets out to find the two kids who have taken his car on a joy ride." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3813310/","name":"Cop Car","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY1NjA2ODY0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzYwODA1NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A small-town sheriff sets out to find the two kids who have taken his car on a joy ride.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3813310/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"A_Different_Drummer","dateCreated":"2015-08-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"bizarre entry in the "real time" category","reviewBody":"While many films use the device of a "real time" narrative for effect (ie, where the viewer is given the sense that he/she is a participant in real time in the story) very few films run the device for the full length.

For example, the Bourne films went into real time when the main character was on screen, but otherwise maintained a traditional narrative. Examples of standout real-time films would include Tom Cruise (amazing) in COLLATERAL; Dennis Weaver in DUEL; and the Canadian sci-fi epic, CUBE.

So now that you know first-rate films CAN potentially be made using the technique, the writer/director of this film (to be kind) did not set his sights quite that high.

Overall, it is not a bad film, it is incredibly engaging given how little is actually going on. However, while all films require a suspension of disbelief, the overall problem with COP CAR is that the two lead characters, boys of about ten years of age, are written as the dumbest children ever to appear in a feature film.

Seriously. In an age where even the Disney channel attributes 'tude, street cred, smarts and fast moves to 7 year olds (ask your child if you don't believe me) these two characters as written are so far removed from coherent thought that the audience starts to wonder if they escaped from "special class." To use the term "pig stupid" for these kids effectively slanders the pig.

Bacon is excellent. Would like to see more of him in features.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32046,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-07","keywords":"sheriff,stealing a car,police car,child uses a gun,child with a gun","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Cop Car","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3722164761","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2NjNDdjNTctZTQ0Mi00NDRjLTljN2EtYjU4N2I0YWZjOWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2NjNDdjNTctZTQ0Mi00NDRjLTljN2EtYjU4N2I0YWZjOWRmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Cop Car","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000102/","name":"Kevin Bacon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6627667/","name":"James Freedson-Jackson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4881741/","name":"Hays Wellford"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1218281/","name":"Jon Watts"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0424445/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0422626/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0541701/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1218281/","name":"Jon Watts","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1755986/","name":"Christopher Ford","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12754932/","name":"Kaden Selvidge"],"duration":"PT1H28M"</script><metacontent="
