programme.title: Zmruz oczy
Zmruż oczy
programme.desc:
Zmruz oczy: Directed by Andrzej Jakimowski. With Zbigniew Zamachowski, Olga Prószynska, Rafal Guzniczak, Malgorzata Foremniak. The story of a spirited ten-year-old girl who has run away from her proudly affluent parents in town and finds grudging refuge with the slightly slovenly caretaker of an abandoned farm, an ex-teacher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0379063/","name":"Zmruz oczy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmZjNzhhNDYtMTg1YS00YWNjLTg0MjctNTY0Zjk1ZDEyZjk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of a spirited ten-year-old girl who has run away from her proudly affluent parents in town and finds grudging refuge with the slightly slovenly caretaker of an abandoned farm, an ex-teacher.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0379063/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jbig"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A review that helps to understand the movie setting","reviewBody":"'Squint your eyes' is a movie not only about a real friendship between a caretaker and a young girl but also between different characters in the movie. 

It is set in contemporary Poland, in a rural area that has seen its better times. The main character, Jasiek is a burnt out teacher from big city. He is now a caretaker at a former soviet era co-op farm. 

Many scenes refer to this post-communist era: the dilapidated police cruiser that gets stuck in mud; the old truck that should be in the museum but out of necessity is still used for transportation.

The rest of the plot deals with the question of what will happen to the girl and her former teacher.

This is a very slow moving film without any fast, shaky camera movements. You get to feel the passage of time and the heat of the summer. The colors are beautiful; they would have been even better had they used better equipment. On the other hand the low budget, forced the director to shoot all the scenes in one take. This turned out to be a blessing since every scene is well thought out.

The director, Andrzej Jakimowski just like Kieslowski takes great care of every detail. There is a scene, hard to believe at first, where the eagle flies away. It has at least two different meanings but what is amazing that something like that actually happened to the director's father.

If you like to see an uplifting, sometimes funny, sad and quirky movie and at the same time learn about the Einstein relativity theory (the scene on the bridge) you will not be disappointed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":898,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-10-24","keywords":"farm,ex teacher,rural setting,unemployment,isolation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1437136/","name":"Olga Prószynska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435653/","name":"Rafal Guzniczak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109608/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109606/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126437/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: I Am Greta
Jestem Greta
I Am Greta
programme.desc: I Am Greta: Directed by Nathan Grossman. With Greta Thunberg, Svante Thunberg, Niclas Svenningsen, António Guterres. The documentary follows Greta Thunberg, a teenage climate activist from Sweden, on her international crusade to get people to listen to scientists about the world's environmental problems." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10394738/","name":"I Am Greta","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVjMzcyZDktNzFhOC00NTY2LTkxMjAtMjJkN2U3ZWZkMzUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDU5MDEyMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The documentary follows Greta Thunberg, a teenage climate activist from Sweden, on her international crusade to get people to listen to scientists about the world's environmental problems.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10394738/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Xstal"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Polaricing Persona...","reviewBody":"It's disturbing that so much vitriol and hate can be targeted at a young woman whose only wish is for the governments of the world to recognise the overwhelming evidence that supports climate change and for them to do something about it before it's too late (assuming it's not too late already). Conversely, it's refreshing and inspiring to know that a young woman has been able to mobilise such a strong and powerful force to fight against the intransigence and/or misinformation pedalled primarily by biased middle aged and older men; although this is primarily a documentary about a person and not a movement. That person is trying to change the world for the better and, with the help, support and vision of the youth of today (and a few others), let's wish her success in her crusade against greed, corruption and ignorance while joining her in the fight for our survival!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7484,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Documentary","Biography"],"datePublished":"2020-10-16","keywords":"environmental activist,climate crisis,teenage girl,female activist,global warming","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1000980761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZmOWQzMWQtMGIwZS00ZjVmLWE0YzItODIwNzU2ZWQzNDFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGZmOWQzMWQtMGIwZS00ZjVmLWE0YzItODIwNzU2ZWQzNDFmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"This documentary follows teenage climate activist Greta Thunberg on her international crusade to get people to listen to scientists about the world's environmental problems."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm10361418/","name":"Greta Thunberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2468871/","name":"Svante Thunberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12524895/","name":"Niclas Svenningsen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5548363/","name":"Nathan Grossman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0337495/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0218858/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075650/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2408218/","name":"Hanna Lejonqvist"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0456599/","name":"Per K. programme.title: The Longest Ride
Najdłuższa podróż
The Longest Ride
programme.desc: The Longest Ride: Directed by George Tillman Jr.. With Britt Robertson, Scott Eastwood, Alan Alda, Jack Huston. The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2726560/","name":"The Longest Ride","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzIzMjg0NjQwNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODAwOTE4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2726560/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"authortinaleonard"},"dateCreated":"2015-04-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Such a cute film","reviewBody":"My husband and I really enjoyed this. It's sweet and romantic. If you like a movie without swearing and gratuitous sex, etc., this is a feel-good story. Alan Alda was wonderful, and we enjoyed seeing him in this role. Scott Eastwood was convincing as a PBR rider trying not to become a has-been and working through issues of his own. There's action for the guys (bull riding), and something for the ladies (bull riding, and a flash of Scott Eastwood's nice buttocks-thank you for that-so there's something for everyone. The actress who played Alan Alda's wife was absolutely darling. Very romantic film about two people who had a meet-cute and found their lives changed in many ways.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80193,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance","Western"],"datePublished":"2015-04-15","keywords":"usa,united states,college student,college,bull riding","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2592911641","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2NTkwODY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUwOTQ4NDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg2NTkwODY1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzUwOTQ4NDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man as he reflects back on a lost love while he's trapped in an automobile crash."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2207222/","name":"Scott Eastwood"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1429380/","name":"Britt Robertson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000257/","name":"Alan Alda"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0863387/","name":"George Tillman Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0081189/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069651/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0817023/","name":"Nicholas Sparks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0093271/","name":"Craig Bolotin"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ten Mistakes that Sank the Titanic
Dziesięć przyczyn zatonięcia Titanica
Ten Mistakes that Sank the Titanic
programme.desc: Ten Mistakes that Sank the Titanic: Directed by Mike Ibeji. With Piers Gibbon, Alexandra Churchill, Stephen Payne, Tim Maltin. From the birth of the fatal iceberg to the hours after it struck the ship, this film follows the Titanic's journey from construction to catastrophe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11281184/","name":"Ten Mistakes that Sank the Titanic","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGM2NTFjMWYtNGZiYi00NGJmLWFkNDUtYzYzZWJiZDc2NjJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI1ODk5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"From the birth of the fatal iceberg to the hours after it struck the ship, this film follows the Titanic's journey from construction to catastrophe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11281184/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AlsExGal"},"dateCreated":"2021-06-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Packs quite a bit of information into its short running time","reviewBody":"Another find while researching the sinking of the Titanic. In "Night To Remember" it is mentioned that the ship Californian sent a wireless message to Titanic to warn them of icebergs. The film never mentions why this message was not relayed to the captain. Apparently the Californian wireless operator was inexperienced and did not prefix the message with "MSG", which means "meant for captain". This is the type of detail mentioned in the brief documentary.\n\nEverything from humans following regulations and not common sense, to open portholes, to construction flaws are talked about. If you are interested in the Titanic I recommend it highly. It is not your usual dissertation on the failure of water tight compartments that are not actually water tight that you probably already know about.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Documentary","History"],"datePublished":"2020-06-07","keywords":"titanic","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1279446/","name":"Piers Gibbon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3932885/","name":"Alexandra Churchill"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11646820/","name":"Stephen Payne"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1136536/","name":"Mike Ibeji"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104132/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1136536/","name":"Mike Ibeji"}],"duration":"PT51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lolo
Lolo
programme.desc: Lolo: Directed by Julie Delpy. With Dany Boon, Julie Delpy, Vincent Lacoste, Karin Viard. Violette, a 40-year old workaholic with a career in the fashion industry falls for a provincial computer geek, Jean-Rene, while on a spa retreat with her best friend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4085944/","name":"Lolo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2MjExMTY0NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjk1MzUwODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Violette, a 40-year old workaholic with a career in the fashion industry falls for a provincial computer geek, Jean-Rene, while on a spa retreat with her best friend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4085944/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ksf-2"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"her son does NOT approve","reviewBody":"Un film français ! Co-writer, director, and starring Julie Delpy! She's Violette, in the fashion industry. She meets a fisherman, and accepts an invitation to a party. Turns out he's really a nice computer guy, and they start dating. But there's a hitch... Violette's son Lolo (Vincent Lacoste) doesn't like the new guy, so he starts doing things to bust them up. And he makes his own mother so paranoid, she starts acting weird around the new guy, JeanRene (Dany Boon). After this goes on for a while, we can only hope that Violette stops blaming JeanRene. Of course, the son is loving every minute of the misunderstandings and screw-ups. Will mom ever catch on? Delpy was an actor for YEARS before she began directing. Shared oscar nominations for Before Midnight and Before Sunset. This one is okay. Like a (really long) episode of three's company. So many misunderstandings... orchestrated by the son.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3971,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-10-28","keywords":"oedipal complex,breastfeeding a baby,breast feeding,breasts pulled out,paris france","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer for Lolo","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi53064473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MDY1MzcyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE5MTQ3NjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MDY1MzcyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE5MTQ3NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A film by Julie Delpy"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0200702/","name":"Dany Boon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3228320/","name":"Vincent Lacoste"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170513/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0261946/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000365/","name":"Julie Delpy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3032208/","name":"Eugénie Grandval"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

Trouble
programme.desc: Trouble: Directed by Kevin Johnson. With Big Sean, Pamela Adlon, Lucy Hale, Marissa Jaret Winokur. A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world, while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6772524/","name":"Trouble","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzk5NTEyZTUtNWM0ZC00ZWMzLTk2ZTMtMDRhMWJiNzJkYmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ3MTA4MDk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A pampered dog named Trouble must learn to live in the real world, while trying to escape from his former owner's greedy children.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6772524/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bastos"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very basic but harmless","reviewBody":"This is a pretty harmless animated movie about a pampered dog that has to learn how to live without privileges. Very basic story but I thought it wasn't as painful as I was expecting it to be, and it even has some heart to it which I found surprising. The animation is not amazing but does its job. I had just watched another terrible animated movie and this one seemed like a Pixar masterpiece when compared, but with some distance I can see it was just OK. I still find the West Side Story dancing squirrels very funny, but I don't think the target audience will understand the joke.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3009,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2021-05-28","keywords":"dog,abandon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3341270553","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZhMjk2NTgtMmMxNC00Yzk2LTkyM2YtOWYyMGI4OTY3N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzZhMjk2NTgtMmMxNC00Yzk2LTkyM2YtOWYyMGI4OTY3N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4510001/","name":"Big Sean"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781899/","name":"Pamela Adlon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1423955/","name":"Lucy Hale"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425557/","name":"Kevin Johnson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0502120/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0574587/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0440876/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0611390/","name":"Rob Muir"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0441750/","name":"Jordan Katz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005558/","name":"Harland Williams"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
Kupiliśmy zoo
We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc:
We Bought a Zoo: Directed by Cameron Crowe. With Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson, Thomas Haden Church, Colin Ford. Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1389137/","name":"We Bought a Zoo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MTE3OTUwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5NjgwNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1389137/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wbhendrix-1"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautiful & Touching, Crowe does it again.","reviewBody":"Cameron Crowe never fails to deliver hart warming drama-comedies that make you laugh, cry and keep you on the edge of your seat for duration of his films. For me personally, I never seem to agree with Crowe's casting taste (Matt Damon and Scarlett Johansson never do much for me) but Cameron has a way with actors and a true vision for his story. He always seems to know exactly who can capture his characters and ultimately draw out your emotions that he's tugging at. 

In We Bought a Zoo, there is a bit of a slow start and at one point I was worried Cameron had lowered his voice to appeal to a larger audience to please producers and critics alike (after his Critically-bombed but personal all time fav, Elizabethtown). 

But let me tell you, pay your dues with the first half of this film because the second half will take you on a mesmerizing cinematic adventure you'll be heartbroken for more. Cameron ventures into a new family drama without compromising his voice, music taste or quality film making. And if you are still not a huge CC fan, the animals are sure to win you over. Their beautiful and natural moments on screen are as breath taking as they are tear-jerking.

Spend an amazing two hours with this film and there won't be a person in your household that won't agree that this film is one to remember. IMDb data; ttnr: 1389137, Title: We Bought a Zoo, --- Description: We Bought a Zoo: Directed by Cameron Crowe. With Matt Damon, Scarlett Johansson, Thomas Haden Church, Colin Ford. Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1389137/","name":"We Bought a Zoo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ0MTE3OTUwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODg5NjgwNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1389137/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"wbhendrix-1","dateCreated":"2011-11-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautiful & Touching, Crowe does it again.","reviewBody":"Cameron Crowe never fails to deliver hart warming drama-comedies that make you laugh, cry and keep you on the edge of your seat for duration of his films. For me personally, I never seem to agree with Crowe's casting taste (Matt Damon and Scarlett Johansson never do much for me) but Cameron has a way with actors and a true vision for his story. He always seems to know exactly who can capture his characters and ultimately draw out your emotions that he's tugging at. 

In We Bought a Zoo, there is a bit of a slow start and at one point I was worried Cameron had lowered his voice to appeal to a larger audience to please producers and critics alike (after his Critically-bombed but personal all time fav, Elizabethtown). 

But let me tell you, pay your dues with the first half of this film because the second half will take you on a mesmerizing cinematic adventure you'll be heartbroken for more. Cameron ventures into a new family drama without compromising his voice, music taste or quality film making. And if you are still not a huge CC fan, the animals are sure to win you over. Their beautiful and natural moments on screen are as breath taking as they are tear-jerking.

Spend an amazing two hours with this film and there won't be a person in your household that won't agree that this film is one to remember. From a fan and living-room-critic, I give it two thumbs up :)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":139984,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Family"],"datePublished":"2011-12-23","keywords":"based on true story,zoo,inspection,2010s,family relationships","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi592747545","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NzI1NDc2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgwMDg2Ng@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM2NzI1NDc2Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTgwMDg2Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo. ","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0424060/","name":"Scarlett Johansson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002006/","name":"Thomas Haden Church"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001081/","name":"Cameron Crowe"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0299664/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047730/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112459/","name":"Aline Brosh McKenna","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001081/","name":"Cameron Crowe","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3349167/","name":"Benjamin Mee"],"duration":"PT2H4M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: My Salinger Year
Mój rok z Salingerem
My Salinger Year
programme.desc:
My Salinger Year: Directed by Philippe Falardeau. With Margaret Qualley, Sigourney Weaver, Douglas Booth, Seána Kerslake. A college grad takes a clerical job working for the literary agent of the renowned, reclusive writer J.D. Salinger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2222052/","name":"My Salinger Year","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzNDM4YWMtZWE5Ny00MTliLWEzY2ItODU0NmE2ZTUzMDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"A college grad takes a clerical job working for the literary agent of the renowned, reclusive writer J.D. Salinger.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2222052/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"imseeg"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Playful, charming, beautiful, original and witty. Unknown GEM!","reviewBody":"BRAVO, what a charming, playful, subtle, witty and original movie this is. A delight to watch!

The story: a young woman leaves everything behind to become a writer in the big city New York. Will she succeed or will she become another failed writer?

The good: this movie is a delight, because of it's playful, charming, subtle and witty nature. You dont have to be into books at all to love this movie.

What's most precious for me about this movie is the photography, especially the many GORGEOUS still screen shots of MARGARET QUALLEY. Those eyes of her, those wide open puppy eyes, ooze innocence and emotions so pure and gentle that they are to die for! Never seen this actress before, but I am instantly smitten with her acting performance, so delicate, so true to life, so expressive.

Any bad? This is a slowburning, subtle story, probably best suited for an arthouse movie audience who are into subtle portraits of characters. A feast to watch! Amazing to see it has only gotten 32 reviews, but it must be the corona troubles with distributing movies that this has slipped from the radar, because it is definitely worth watching every single minute. What a gem!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3302,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-03-05","keywords":"writer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer (2021)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi728351001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM5NjRkMzMtY2QyMi00Y2NmLWEyOTQtY2IwNWRmOTVmNTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM5NjRkMzMtY2QyMi00Y2NmLWEyOTQtY2IwNWRmOTVmNTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"New York in the 90s: After leaving graduate school to pursue her dream of becoming a writer, Joanna (Margaret Qualley) gets hired as an assistant to Margaret (Sigourney Weaver), the stoic and old-fashioned literary agent of J. D. Salinger. Fluctuating between poverty and glamour, she spends her days in a plush, wood-paneled office – where dictaphones and typewriters still reign and agents doze off after three-martini lunches – and her nights in a sink-less Brooklyn apartment with her socialist boyfriend. Joanna’s main task is processing Salinger’s voluminous fan mail, but as she reads the heart-wrenching letters from around the world, she becomes reluctant to send the agency’s impersonal standard letter and impulsively begins personalizing the responses. The results are both humorous and moving, as Joanna, while using the great writer’s voice, begins to discover her own."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4960279/","name":"Margaret Qualley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3150488/","name":"Douglas Booth"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265852/","name":"Philippe Falardeau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089507/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044330/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265852/","name":"Philippe Falardeau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5117507/","name":"Joanna Smith Rakoff"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Fever Pitch
Miłosna zagrywka
Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Fever Pitch: Directed by Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly. With Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack, Jack Kehler. Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0332047/","name":"Fever Pitch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNTE4ODA2N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzg5ODUyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0332047/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MissPearBanana"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Awwww","reviewBody":"I saw this movie on Thursdays night after having a really boring day. I had no expectations, those I had were rather negative. Being that the only movie I've ever watched Jimmy in is the American version of Taxi with Queen Latifah(?)...don't ask why! But seriously..this movie is so cute! Drew Barrymore is always sweet, but I almost fell in love with Fallon's character. Why can't I meet a cute nerd like that. :) Movies like that are excellent. Simple, sweet and necessary. Sunday on a Thursdays. I'm not even a sports fan, but it's something about American movies with baseball that fascinates me. Probably the fact that we don't have that sport here in Norway.\n\n(My first comment ever.) Haha","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":44332,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2005-04-08","keywords":"mri,boston red sox,baltimore orioles,world series,ups","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fever Pitch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4121297177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZThhYWEwMzctOGFjZS00NDI0LWJjNzktZTdiNDMwNjliN2E3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZThhYWEwMzctOGFjZS00NDI0LWJjNzktZTdiNDMwNjliN2E3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0266422/","name":"Jimmy Fallon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1555151/","name":"Jason Spevack"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125803/","name":"Bobby Farrelly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0268380/","name":"Peter Farrelly"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148520/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005838/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0304665/","name":"Lowell Ganz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541632/","name":"Babaloo Mandel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394984/","name":"Nick Hornby"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Piłka nożna: Liga angielska - mecz: Wolverhampton Wanderers FC - Liverpool FC
programme.desc: Arthur, Kalle i Yussuf są przyjaciółmi, których różni niemal wszystko. Łączy ich jedynie fakt, że mają piękne córki, które właśnie zakochały się w nieodpowiednich mężczyznach. Ojcowie zamierzają pozbyć się niechcianych kandydatów na zięciów. Nie spoczną, gdyż stawką jest przyszłość ich córek.

programme.title: Es ist zu deinem Besten
Ojcowie kontra zięciowie

It's funny, has a great cast, and emphasizes the complicated science (!!) involved in weather forecasting.\n\nThis movie tried to establish a strong female character with big ambitions and career goals on the horizon. It starts and it's super cute and actually resembles Scooby-Doo. But then it just goes off the rails. It has stupid cameos, pop culture nonsense like dabbing?? It was so basic. I don't love the animation style they look like they are made from each plastic and the voice acting is kinda off putting because for the most part non of the characters sound like any incarnation of them from the past which is strange as some of the old cast members spoke about wanting to return and were disappointed not to be asked.

My other complaint is there want really a main monster to fight against it seemed to randomly pop up in the end. programme.title: Rozdroze Cafe
Rozdroże cafe
programme.desc:
Rozdroze Cafe: Directed by Leszek Wosiewicz. With Robert Olech, Piotr Glowacki, Cezary Lukaszewicz, Martyna Peszko." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479261/","name":"Rozdroze Cafe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGJjYTU2NWQtZmUzNy00YTA5LWE3NWMtZDUzNzhiYTIyMGQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479261/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"temporarybobi"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well done","reviewBody":"I saw this film in Krakow's Kino Pod Baranami. Film was well done. It depicts the misunderstandings among some young polish provincial people, who have the ambitions to crop up in the new post-communist, re-capitalist society.

While the young women in the film are trying to escape the disconsolately life by either getting know established oldsters or by giving birth to numerous children, the young men decide to rob a bank. Things get wrong, one of the guys flips out and kills four people.

The film is supposed to be based on a true story which has happened for about 3-4 years in Warsaw. The screenplay makes use of many clichés, otherwise film is well done."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-11-11","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2027064/","name":"Robert Olech"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1644158/","name":"Piotr Glowacki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2021835/","name":"Cezary Lukaszewicz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941829/","name":"Leszek Wosiewicz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941829/","name":"Leszek Wosiewicz"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

With Robert Olech, Piotr Glowacki, Cezary Lukaszewicz, Martyna Peszko." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0479261/","name":"Rozdroze Cafe","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGJjYTU2NWQtZmUzNy00YTA5LWE3NWMtZDUzNzhiYTIyMGQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0479261/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"temporarybobi","dateCreated":"2005-11-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Well done","reviewBody":"I saw this film in Krakow's Kino Pod Baranami. Film was well done. It depicts the misunderstandings among some young polish provincial people, who have the ambitions to crop up in the new post-communist, re-capitalist society.

While the young women in the film are trying to escape the disconsolately life by either getting know established oldsters or by giving birth to numerous children, the young men decide to rob a bank. Things get wrong, one of the guys flips out and kills four people.

The film is supposed to be based on a true story which has happened for about 3-4 years in Warsaw. The screenplay makes use of many clichés, otherwise film is well done.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-11-11","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2027064/","name":"Robert Olech","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1644158/","name":"Piotr Glowacki","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2021835/","name":"Cezary Lukaszewicz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941829/","name":"Leszek Wosiewicz"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941829/","name":"Leszek Wosiewicz"],"duration":"PT1H52M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Łapu-capu extra
programme.desc: Najśmieszniejsze fragmenty z programów polskich stacji TV: gafy popełniane przez prezenterów, ich nietypowe zachowania przed kamerą oraz awarie techniczne powodujące absurdalne sytuacje.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: The Congress
Kongres
The Congress
programme.desc: The Congress: Directed by Ari Folman. With Robin Wright, Harvey Keitel, Sami Gayle, Jon Hamm. An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1821641/","name":"The Congress","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5MTUzNDk3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTUwNTQ5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1821641/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MdlndeHond"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautifully executed doom Scifi","reviewBody":"It's two movies really the first part where you feel the impending doom set upon Robin Wright as she is caught between either professionally die off soon or make a deal that takes it all. \n\nIt so vividly explores the fine line between choice and the illusion of having one. The second part has a strong resemblance to Waking Life in it's psychedelic execution more than Waltz with Bashir. Existentialism, morality, Corporatocracy and the beautiful animation make this the most marvellous yet terrifying Sci-fi I have seen in ages. Watch Harvey Keitels monologue in the first half, it is outstanding. Robin Wright is as always amazing and gets extra kudos for playing herself in an alternate universe where her career has failed. It is all together a masterpiece.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18236,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Animation","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-07-03","keywords":"female protagonist,satire,dystopia,cinema,tom cruise character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi892512537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk1ODkwNzMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU3NDAwMDE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjk1ODkwNzMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU3NDAwMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":" \tAn aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000705/","name":"Robin Wright"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358316/","name":"Jon Hamm"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284369/","name":"Ari Folman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0232356/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052813/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054609/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501015/","name":"Stanislaw Lem"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284369/","name":"Ari Folman"}],"duration":"PT2H2M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
E.T.
E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Dee Wallace, Henry Thomas, Peter Coyote, Robert MacNaughton. A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0083866/","name":"E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2ODFlMDAtNzdhOC00ZDYzLWE3YTMtNDU4ZGFmZmJmYTczXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0083866/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Catherine_Grace_Zeh"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very touching movie about a special friendship for all ages that will warm your heart and make you cry","reviewBody":"E.T. THE EXTRA TERRESTRIAL, in my opinion, is a very touching movie about a special friendship for all ages that will warm your heart and make you cry. I really loved the magic that E.T. performed. If I could have, I would have helped him get to safety myself. The only problem is how I would get him to safety, since I can't drive. The score was good, the costumes were perfectly designed, everyone was cast perfectly, and the direction was flawless. In conclusion, I highly recommend this very touching movie about a special friendship for all ages to anyone who hasn't seen it. You're in for a real treat and a good time, so go to the video store, rent it or buy it, kick back with someone close to you, and watch it. I guarantee you you'll thoroughly enjoy it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":389823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Family","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1983-04-25","keywords":"friendly alien,extraterrestrial,empathy,alien,friendship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial: Anniversay Edition [Blu-Ray + Digital Copy]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3090130201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ3Yzk1ODAtMzcyYS00Mjg3LWE2NjQtNzY3M2IwOTNjYmMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ3Yzk1ODAtMzcyYS00Mjg3LWE2NjQtNzY3M2IwOTNjYmMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer 2 for E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001794/","name":"Henry Thomas"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001075/","name":"Peter Coyote"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0558953/","name":"Melissa Mathison"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Antoinette dans les Cévennes
Osiołek, kochanek i ja
Antoinette dans les Cévennes
programme.desc: Antoinette dans les Cévennes: Directed by Caroline Vignal. With Laure Calamy, Benjamin Lavernhe, Olivia Côte, Marc Fraize. Antoinette, a school teacher, is looking forward to her long planned summer holidays with her secret lover Vladimir, the father of one of her pupils. programme.title: Safe Spaces
Strefa komfortu
Safe Spaces
programme.desc: Safe Spaces: Directed by Daniel Schechter. With Justin Long, Kate Berlant, Lynn Cohen, Michael Godere. An NYC professor spends a week re-connecting with his family while defending his reputation over controversial behavior at his college." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7187768/","name":"Safe Spaces","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGU4MTdkMTMtOWFjOC00YzM5LThlOTctODk5OGJjMDY3ZDZkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTU5Mzk0NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An NYC professor spends a week re-connecting with his family while defending his reputation over controversial behavior at his college.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7187768/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jmiller21"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"The power of family and the insanity of liberal universities","reviewBody":"There is a good story here. How a family pulls together during a trying time, despite their differences, conflicts and foibles to love and care for each other. There is nonsense here that I fear may be an all too real ultra sensitivity that pervades liberal campuses. While the traumatic difficulties that one may face in their youth may be regrettable, there is no way that the Jennifer Mann character will be able to function in real life if she thinks she can live in a bubble of protection from someone hurting her delicate sensitivities. In some ways this is a powerful contrasts. There is family where there is acceptable and strengthening of backbone and character by the sibling rivalries that persist. Without realizing it, perhaps this movie is a meaningful criticism of the politically correct culture that weakens our fiber and a call to family to strengthen it. Put the challenges Agatha and her story of escaping Nazi Germany, learning a new language and a new life, and facing death and the strength she showed in contrast with the "triggered" response of students seemingly can't deal with the simple realities of seeing another person feel bad to the point of threatening a professor's job. A normal human being would simply experience the class, discount the remarks that the professor made, perhaps utter a "meh" and go one with their own life. The contrast of Agatha to the youth of today is damning.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":661,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-11-15","keywords":"jew,jewish,teacher student relationship,adjunct professor,family relationships","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"After Class","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1908522777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmVlYjA0NDEtMDAxYy00MjVjLTgzYTEtNmRlOGE0MDUwNWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmVlYjA0NDEtMDAxYy00MjVjLTgzYTEtNmRlOGE0MDUwNWQyXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0519043/","name":"Justin Long"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2547958/","name":"Kate Berlant"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169565/","name":"Lynn Cohen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1633080/","name":"Daniel Schechter"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0474730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1633080/","name":"Daniel Schechter"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Photograph
Fotografia
The Photograph
programme.desc: The Photograph: Directed by Stella Meghie. With Issa Rae, LaKeith Stanfield, Chanté Adams, Y'lan Noel. A series of intertwining love stories set in the past and in the present." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7798646/","name":"The Photograph","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY3OWY4NDMtNmMwYy00ODNmLTljODAtMzEyNWI5ZDc1YzU3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A series of intertwining love stories set in the past and in the present.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7798646/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnobReviews"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow paced but beautifully shot and wonderfully acted.","reviewBody":"Fueled by the fiery chemistry between Issa Rae and Lakeith Stanfield, "The Photograph" gives viewers a love story that transcends time and is worth sticking around for. . In this romantic drama, the estranged daughter of a famous photographer falls in love with the journalist who is investigating her late mother's life. . Beautifully shot, wonderfully acted and even original at times, "The Photograph" is slow paced and won't be for everyone but the pay out is worth it. Issa Rae and Lakeith Stanfield burn up the screen with their intense performances, you'd think they were actually a couple. I thought the premise was interesting and even though "The Photograph" is not perfect, it felt good to watch a romantic drama; a genre that isn't as tackled in this day and age of film. . Follow @snobmedia for more reviews!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4869,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2020-02-14","keywords":"mother daughter relationship,safe deposit box,photographer,learning from the past,single woman","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4132486937","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZlOWQ4Y2ItZDljOS00YTNlLTk2MzUtNDRiYWU2ZTk4ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDZlOWQ4Y2ItZDljOS00YTNlLTk2MzUtNDRiYWU2ZTk4ZDJhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"On Valentine’s Day, Issa Rae (HBO’s Insecure, Little) and LaKeith Stanfield (FX's Atlanta, Sorry to Bother You) connect in a romance where a woman must learn from the secrets in her mother’s past if she is to move forward and allow herself to love and be loved."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4793987/","name":"Issa Rae"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3147751/","name":"LaKeith Stanfield"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6001320/","name":"Chanté Adams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4907810/","name":"Stella Meghie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0739708/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0453699/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4907810/","name":"Stella Meghie"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

Body Brokers
programme.desc: Body Brokers: Directed by John Swab. With Suzanne Wind, Frank Grillo, Alice Englert, Samone James. Brought to Los Angeles for treatment, a recovering junkie soon learns that the rehab center is not about helping people, but a cover for a multi-billion-dollar fraud operation that enlists addicts to recruit other addicts." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9585676/","name":"Body Brokers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmYzMjQ4ZTAtMjI0OC00ZDhiLWJkMzctMDgxYTI2ZDRiYTg0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brought to Los Angeles for treatment, a recovering junkie soon learns that the rehab center is not about helping people, but a cover for a multi-billion-dollar fraud operation that enlists addicts to recruit other addicts.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9585676/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Xavier_Stone"},"dateCreated":"2021-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A unique tale, a bit overdone and barely alright","reviewBody":"The start and setup of this movie is decent and it tells an interesting story. However the financials are way out of whack and ruins any true insight. The wandering path is done adequately enough but it feels half finished and leaves an unsatisfied feeling at the completion. Maybe it's just me, but if you're going to make a movie about preaching the dangers of drugs and wanting people to change I think you need to put an effort into making a good film. Otherwise it's easily forgotten 5 minutes after watching it, like this one is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2213,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-02-19","keywords":"los angeles california,drug addiction,addiction,fraud,reference to the affordable care act","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2724708633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTVjODUwYjktOTM3OC00OGZhLWI0MGYtOWU4ODFkNTFkMDk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTVjODUwYjktOTM3OC00OGZhLWI0MGYtOWU4ODFkNTFkMDk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Utah and Opal are junkies living on the streets of rural Ohio until a seemingly chance encounter with the enigmatic Wood (Michael Kenneth Williams) brings them to Los Angeles for treatment. While Utah finds sobriety with the help of the treatment center shrink (Academy Award®-Winner Melissa Leo), he soon learns that rehab is not about helping people--it's merely a cover scheme for a multibillion dollar fraud operation, enlisting addicts to recruit other addicts. Seduced by the money, but troubled by the hypocrisy, Utah must decide between what will make him rich, and what will save Opal."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm12333318/","name":"Suzanne Wind"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342029/","name":"Frank Grillo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2129444/","name":"Alice Englert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6461537/","name":"John Swab"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0320829/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0586673/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0474730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6461537/","name":"John Swab"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Zmruz oczy
Zmruż oczy
programme.desc:
Zmruz oczy: Directed by Andrzej Jakimowski. With Zbigniew Zamachowski, Olga Prószynska, Rafal Guzniczak, Malgorzata Foremniak. The story of a spirited ten-year-old girl who has run away from her proudly affluent parents in town and finds grudging refuge with the slightly slovenly caretaker of an abandoned farm, an ex-teacher." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0379063/","name":"Zmruz oczy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmZjNzhhNDYtMTg1YS00YWNjLTg0MjctNTY0Zjk1ZDEyZjk4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of a spirited ten-year-old girl who has run away from her proudly affluent parents in town and finds grudging refuge with the slightly slovenly caretaker of an abandoned farm, an ex-teacher.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0379063/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jbig"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A review that helps to understand the movie setting","reviewBody":"'Squint your eyes' is a movie not only about a real friendship between a caretaker and a young girl but also between different characters in the movie. 

It is set in contemporary Poland, in a rural area that has seen its better times. The main character, Jasiek is a burnt out teacher from big city. He is now a caretaker at a former soviet era co-op farm. 

Many scenes refer to this post-communist era: the dilapidated police cruiser that gets stuck in mud; the old truck that should be in the museum but out of necessity is still used for transportation.

The rest of the plot deals with the question of what will happen to the girl and her former teacher.

This is a very slow moving film without any fast, shaky camera movements. You get to feel the passage of time and the heat of the summer. The colors are beautiful; they would have been even better had they used better equipment. On the other hand the low budget, forced the director to shoot all the scenes in one take. This turned out to be a blessing since every scene is well thought out.

The director, Andrzej Jakimowski just like Kieslowski takes great care of every detail. There is a scene, hard to believe at first, where the eagle flies away. It has at least two different meanings but what is amazing that something like that actually happened to the director's father.

If you like to see an uplifting, sometimes funny, sad and quirky movie and at the same time learn about the Einstein relativity theory (the scene on the bridge) you will not be disappointed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":898,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-10-24","keywords":"farm,ex teacher,rural setting,unemployment,isolation","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0952498/","name":"Zbigniew Zamachowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1437136/","name":"Olga Prószynska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435653/","name":"Rafal Guzniczak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109608/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109606/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126437/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1435889/","name":"Andrzej Jakimowski"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: You May Kiss the Bridesmaid
Możesz pocałować druhnę
You May Kiss the Bridesmaid
programme.desc: You May Kiss the Bridesmaid: Directed by Caroline Labrèche. With Tori Anderson, Kristopher Turner, Julia Borsellino, Sarah Orenstein. Food influencer Scarlett Bailey is presented with the opportunity of a lifetime to work as a pastry chef in one of NYC's top restaurants. Her life gets put on hold when she returns to her hometown for her sister Maddie's wedding. Scarlett learns that her parents have sold the family home, a B&B, to her childhood flame Liam Perry and that Maddie has lost her wedding venue days before the nuptials. Scarlett suggests they host the event at the B&B and works with Liam to pull off the wedding of Maddie's dreams, trying to put their history behind them. As her dream job in NYC becomes a firm offer, Scarlett is forced to make a decision. She has been falling back in love with Liam and with her childhood home. With the countdown to the wedding day on, will Liam Perry get to kiss the bridesmaid?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12829388/","name":"You May Kiss the Bridesmaid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWI3MTQwNzgtYmIzNy00YWI3LWIxMGEtYmE5YmU1YmVmN2RmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Food influencer Scarlett Bailey is presented with the opportunity of a lifetime to work as a pastry chef in one of NYC's top restaurants. programme.title: The Stand In
Dublerka
The Stand-In
programme.desc: The Stand In: Directed by Jamie Babbit. With Drew Barrymore, Sarah Jes Austell, Michael Zegen, T.J. Miller. THE STAND-IN is the story of a disaffected comedy actress and her ambitious stand-in trading places." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7970348/","name":"The Stand In","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjE0YWZjZTItMmUwYy00OGNlLWJkZmItZDk2YWJjZmViOTBjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY1MTg4Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"THE STAND-IN is the story of a disaffected comedy actress and her ambitious stand-in trading places.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7970348/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mauricioalexisveliz"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not a comedy but it's a good movie!","reviewBody":"Ok, I understand the bad reviews because the movie was presented as a comedy, but it's not a comedy at all. It's more of a drama / thriller movie and within those genres it works very well. Drew Barrymore did an excellent job, she played two roles, this depressed, overwhelmed woman with severe problems and on the other hand there is this other character, who at first seems to be a happy girl with problems but innocent, although little by little she is showing her true essence. So if you are going to see this movie, I recommend you not to see it as a comedy, because you will not find jokes, funny scenes, etc. See this movie for what it is, a drama with touches of thriller. And I repeat, Drew Barrymore really did an excellent job here!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2980,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-12-11","keywords":"actress","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3136274713","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDhmMGVhMzktMjQwNC00YWIyLWI0ZWEtMzU0ODQzNjcwOWU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDhmMGVhMzktMjQwNC00YWIyLWI0ZWEtMzU0ODQzNjcwOWU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When ordered to serve a year in rehab, actress Candy (Drew Barrymore) hires her on set stand-in to take her place. The unassuming woman flips the script and steals her identity, career and boyfriend in this hilarious comedy about trading places."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000106/","name":"Drew Barrymore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5304955/","name":"Sarah Jes Austell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1652433/","name":"Michael Zegen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0044803/","name":"Jamie Babbit"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0360871/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148534/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0721934/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1095060/","name":"Sam Bain"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Let Him Go
Prawo krwi
Let Him Go
programme.desc:
Let Him Go: Directed by Thomas Bezucha. With Diane Lane, Kevin Costner, Kayli Carter, Ryan Bruce. A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9340860/","name":"Let Him Go","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGNhN2I2NzEtMzFiMy00Y2IzLTk0OTctNjcxZmYwYjIyMzEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY1MTg4Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9340860/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jdesando"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"An modern gothic western set in the 50's with top performances.","reviewBody":"Let Him Go is a western-gothic crime thriller with a North Western setting and some resemblance to vintage oaters like The Searchers. The search has elemental film roots with mental and physical violence enhanced by Leslie Manville as a bad grandma and her wicked sons.

It's fun to see the bad guys get roughed up. It's also satisfying to see the searching-for-family motif of contemporary super-hero films played out in the Western plains even if it was filmed in Calgary. The craggy mountains and little towns complement the late fifties setting when love and crime occur in simple but stark ways.

Retired Montana Sheriff George (Kevin Costner) and his wife, Margaret (Diane Lane), search for their grandson, Jimmy (Bram Hornung and Otto Hornung) after the death of their son, James (Ryan Bruce). Former daughter in law Lorna (Kavli Carter) has left abruptly with new husband, Donny Weboy (Will Britain), and grandson, relocating under duress to North Dakota and his family- Weboy territory where matriarch Blanche (Manville) wields absolute power. Very bad move. The chase begins.

Lane and Costner are in top-aging form, tough and tenderhearted enough to fight the Weboy clan for the grandson. This is a different, more nuanced role for them when they were Superman's parents. Let Him Go adds an authenticity to the thriller formula by emphasizing the devotion of the loving couple to each other and their quest to keep the family whole, or at least provide a fitting family life for their grandson.

The usual Western tropes apply like the corrupt sheriff, bad grandma and sons, the kind stranger, the tough mother, and the epic ending battle. What goes beyond the formula is the sincere love propelling the plot and corralling our hearts. And, of course, the fully-seasoned Lane and Costner.

IMDb data; ttnr: 9340860, Title: Let Him Go, --- Description: Let Him Go: Directed by Thomas Bezucha. With Diane Lane, Kevin Costner, Kayli Carter, Ryan Bruce. A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt9340860/","name":"Let Him Go","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGNhN2I2NzEtMzFiMy00Y2IzLTk0OTctNjcxZmYwYjIyMzEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY1MTg4Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt9340860/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jdesando","dateCreated":"2020-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"An modern gothic western set in the 50's with top performances.","reviewBody":"Let Him Go is a western-gothic crime thriller with a North Western setting and some resemblance to vintage oaters like The Searchers. The search has elemental film roots with mental and physical violence enhanced by Leslie Manville as a bad grandma and her wicked sons.

It's fun to see the bad guys get roughed up. It's also satisfying to see the searching-for-family motif of contemporary super-hero films played out in the Western plains even if it was filmed in Calgary. The craggy mountains and little towns complement the late fifties setting when love and crime occur in simple but stark ways.

Retired Montana Sheriff George (Kevin Costner) and his wife, Margaret (Diane Lane), search for their grandson, Jimmy (Bram Hornung and Otto Hornung) after the death of their son, James (Ryan Bruce). Former daughter in law Lorna (Kavli Carter) has left abruptly with new husband, Donny Weboy (Will Britain), and grandson, relocating under duress to North Dakota and his family- Weboy territory where matriarch Blanche (Manville) wields absolute power. Very bad move. The chase begins.

Lane and Costner are in top-aging form, tough and tenderhearted enough to fight the Weboy clan for the grandson. This is a different, more nuanced role for them when they were Superman's parents. Let Him Go adds an authenticity to the thriller formula by emphasizing the devotion of the loving couple to each other and their quest to keep the family whole, or at least provide a fitting family life for their grandson.

The usual Western tropes apply like the corrupt sheriff, bad grandma and sons, the kind stranger, the tough mother, and the epic ending battle. What goes beyond the formula is the sincere love propelling the plot and corralling our hearts. And, of course, the fully-seasoned Lane and Costner.

Let Him Go is much more than the genre it represents.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21706,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-11-06","keywords":"based on novel,husband wife relationship,grief,final battle,final showdown","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi876658201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzBmMGExZjQtYTFmMy00NTc1LThhNWEtZWRmMzI4ZTk4ZGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzBmMGExZjQtYTFmMy00NTc1LThhNWEtZWRmMzI4ZTk4ZGY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following the loss of their son, retired sheriff George Blackledge (Costner) and his wife Margaret (Lane) leave their Montana ranch to rescue their young grandson from the clutches of a dangerous family living off the grid in the Dakotas, headed by matriarch Blanche Weboy. When they discover the Weboys have no intention of letting the child go, George and Margaret are left with no choice but to fight for their family.

programme.title: Pornografia
Pornografia
programme.desc:
Pornografia: Directed by Jan Jakub Kolski. With Krzysztof Majchrzak, Adam Ferency, Krzysztof Globisz, Grazyna Blecka-Kolska. Two intellectuals, a writer and a director, begin to play a mysterious psychological game in a peaceful countryside manor house during the Nazi occupation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0357037/","name":"Pornografia","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyNTY3ODE2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODMwNTQ4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two intellectuals, a writer and a director, begin to play a mysterious psychological game in a peaceful countryside manor house during the Nazi occupation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0357037/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mengedegna"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Spielberg should sue","reviewBody":"What on earth could have possessed the NY Film Festival selection committee to inflict this pretentious, boring, derivative, ugly and silly piece of third-rate filmmaking on its audience? Because it's Polish and we haven't had a lot of worthwhile Polish movies since Kieslowski? Has it come to that?

The film takes Witold Gombrowicz's long-winded but intermittently fascinating classic novel and superimposes a gratuitous (and fatuous) Spielbergesque holocaust plot line, to make it all, I guess, more compelling. The effect is glaringly contrived and (as with the far better Spielberg original) offensively trivializing.

In case anyone misses the point, the holocaust plot overlay involves a doomed little girl and, at the dénouement, a shift to a black-and-white background against which is displayed, in color, a talismanic link to her. Sound familiar? Spielberg should sue.

The sad thing is that there is some talent at work here. Though the plot is gratuitously confusing, meandering, and contrived, the use of a country house around which a low-intensity conflict between Germans and Polish partisans swirls obliquely is effective, with the fighting intruding suddenly into and then just as suddenly vanishing from the playing out of the protagonists' humdrum idleness and self-absorption. Grayzna Blecka-Kolska gives a performance that almost transcends the clichés written into her role as the quietly tipsy châtelaine, and the two young people who are the objects of the middle-aged protagonists' dirty-old-man obsessions (Gombrowicz's central plot line, if no longer Kolski's) look as if they might have been far more effectively used in some other movie, one in which they were given something to do beyond standing around and looking beautiful (which they are, it should be said). But on the whole, this is an over-the-top, pretentious dud, the sort of thing that should be seen only by the paid critics who then have a professional obligation and civic duty to spare all the rest of us such an irritating waste of our time.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":939,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama","Romance","War"],"datePublished":"2003-10-17","keywords":"sex standing up,lift skirt,panties hit the floor,panties pulled down,fondling","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0538048/","name":"Krzysztof Majchrzak"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272295/","name":"Adam Ferency"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0322937/","name":"Krzysztof Globisz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094194/","name":"Luc Bondy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0102722/","name":"Gérard Brach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0326822/","name":"Witold Gombrowicz"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Moda na "Króla"
programme.desc: Dokument zdradza kulisy wyjątkowego pomysłu łączącego świat mody i filmu. Widzowie poznają projektantów oraz śledzą etapy powstawania kolekcji, która inspirowana jest duchem epoki z serialowej superprodukcji.

programme.title: Jak powstawał serial "Król"
programme.desc: Kulisy powstawania serialu "Król" w reżyserii Jana P. Matuszyńskiego. Produkcja stanowi ekranizację powieści Szczepana Twardocha o tym samym tytule.

programme.title: Miasta rytm: Zrabowane dzieła sztuki
programme.desc: W trakcie II wojny światowej z Polski zniknęły setki tysięcy bezcennych dzieł sztuki. Zarówno niemieccy, jak i radzieccy okupanci masowo wywozili obrazy i rzeźby. Nie wszystkie udało się odzyskać. Obecnie wiele z tych polskich zbiorów rozsianych jest po całym świecie. Historyk sztuki Jerzy S. Majewski przybliża losy tych zrabowanych dóbr. Snuje opowieść o skradzionym dorobku wielu wspaniałych artystów i wyjaśnia, co się z nim dokładnie stało.

programme.title: Making of "Belfer. Sezon 2"
programme.desc: Publikacja najciekawszych materiałów z planu drugiego sezonu serialowego hitu. Realizatorzy filmu i aktorzy opowiadają o produkcji w niedługich wywiadach, które wzbogacone są ujęciami i kadrami z serialu.

programme.title: "Zasada przyjemności" - making of
programme.desc: Bashir Hamed (Hamza Haq), pochodzący z Syrii lekarz pogotowia ratunkowego, przeprowadza się do Kanady. Próbuje dostosować się do nowego życia, nie może jednak natychmiast rozpocząć pracy. Wreszcie mężczyzna pokonuje wszelkie trudności i trafia na praktykę do najlepszego szpitala w Toronto.

programme.title: Listy do więzienia
The Letter Room
programme.desc: Dobroduszny, ale samotny Richard (Oscar Isaac) zostaje dyrektorem więzienia. Teraz musi przeglądać całą korespondencję osadzonych. Czytając ich listy, zaczyna bliżej poznawać prywatne sprawy podopiecznych. Interesuje się zwłaszcza skazańcem znajdującym się w celi śmierci. Postanawia podjąć działania, które wydają mu się słuszne.

programme.title: Jakubiak lokalnie 3
programme.desc: Tomasz Jakubiak po raz trzeci wyrusza w Polskę, aby odkrywać lokalne smaki i aromaty. Odwiedza różne miejsca i czerpie inspiracje z różnych produktów. Łączy nieznane tradycyjne smaki z kucharską maestrią. Tym razem prowadzący przypomina widzom o istnieniu krajowych serów pleśniowych, tradycyjnych jogurtów oraz doskonałych ziół, rewelacyjnych miodów pitnych a także potraw, które od stuleci przygotowują, mieszkające w naszym kraju mniejszości narodowe.

programme.title: News+
programme.desc: Podsumowanie najważniejszych wydarzeń z aren sportowych. Omówienie sukcesów, rekordów i porażek. Program prowadzą zamiennie m.in. Piotr Karpiński, Piotr Salak, Wojciech Zawioła i Gabriel Rogaczewski.

programme.title: Tenis: Turniej WTA Finals w Guadalajarze
programme.desc: Cykl wywiadów przeprowadzanych przez Tomka Ćwiąkałę z ważnymi postaciami ze świata futbolu. Wśród nich są mistrzowie świata, Europy i gwiazdy topowych lig. Widzowie dowiedzą się, czym zajmują się dzisiaj, jak wspominają swoje kariery oraz poznają ich plany na przyszłość.

programme.title: THE LEGENDS z Tomkiem Ćwiąkałą

programme.title: 365 obiadów Mariety Mareckiej
programme.desc: Gospodyni programu podpowiada, skąd czerpać inspiracje na codzienne obiady. Marieta Marecka zaprezentuje szereg prostych posiłków. W każdym odcinku zaprezentuje trzy nowe, często zaskakujące potrawy.

programme.title: Zielona rewolucja Marty Dymek
programme.desc: Popularna blogerka Marta Dymek w każdym odcinku próbuje przekonać zaproszonego gościa do kuchni wegetariańskiej. Prowadząca pokaże, jak zastąpić potrawy mięsne ich jarskimi wariacjami.

programme.title: Bitwa na smaki: David vs Matteo 3
programme.desc: David Gaboriaud I Matteo Brunetti po raz trzeci staną do kulinarnego pojedynku. W każdym odcinku kucharze zaprezentują swoje umiejętności w próbie przygotowanej przez przybyłych do studia gości.

programme.title: Bitwa na smaki: David vs Matteo 3
