programme.review: --- Actors: Tom Cruise (role=Maverick), Kelly McGillis (role=Charlie), Val Kilmer (role=Ice), Anthony Edwards (role=Goose), Tom Skerritt (role=Viper), Michael Ironside (role=Jester), John Stockwell (role=Cougar), Barry Tubb (role=Wolfman), Rick Rossovich (role=Slider), Tim Robbins (role=Merlin), Clarence Gilyard Jr. (role=Sundown), Whip Hubley (role=Hollywood)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0092099, Title: Top Gun, --- Description: Top Gun: Directed by Tony Scott. With Tom Cruise, Kelly McGillis, Val Kilmer, Anthony Edwards. As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0092099/","name":"Top Gun","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQxYTA3ODItNzgxMy00N2Y2LWJlZGMtMTRlM2JkZjI1ZDhhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0092099/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Artdoag2","dateCreated":"2003-08-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"TOP GUN rocks, plain and simple","reviewBody":"I can't believe the reviews I have read about Top Gun being technically inaccurate, not enough character development, an overall simple and childish plot... gimme a freegin' break! This film was made to look cool, sound cool, and define cool. Yeah, okay, the MiG-28s are really F-5 Tigers; I've read the 'goofs' section before. And Tom Cruise's height. And about 'Maverick going supersonic - I'll be there in 30 seconds,' and the laws of physics preventing him from covering 200 or so miles from the carrier in that time. Whatever! So what! If Top Gun had tried to be accurate and true-to-life in every respect, it would have been some oh-so-serious flick like Courage Under Fire. Here's some examples of what I mean:

1 - what's the best way to evade cannon fire? Do a snazzy barrel roll. Problem solved!

2 - the MiG pilots have tinted visors. The good guys don't. Go figure.

2.5 - Russian planes are actually grey or green. The MiG 28s are black. The Tomcats are... yeah, you guessed it... white! Good vs. Evil.

3 - Modern air-to-air combat is usually fought at distances of tens of miles between aircraft. Top Gun uses much cooler spitting-distance WWI era tactics.

4 - "It's too close for missiles. I'm switching to guns!" Enough said.

5 - the generic guy carrying coffee who gets knocked over by the fuming air-control officer. We never see him get up. Classic.

6 - even the edited TV version is a few steps above normal-cool. "... you'll be flying a cargo plane [edit]... out of Hong Kong!"

7 - the way Iceman says, "Mayday, Mav's in trouble. He's in a flat spin, and heading out to sea."

8 - the graceful way Top Gun maintained a PG rating, without using the F-word once.

Top Gun came out in 1986. That's 1986. Seventeen years ago. It rocked then... it rocks now. Just watch it and have some fun.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":313777,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Drama"],"datePublished":"1986-05-16","keywords":"pilot,flying,flight school,jet,male objectification","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"3D Re-release","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3442321177","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNzExNjIzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjA5NzAwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjExNzExNjIzM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjA5NzAwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the trailer for the 3D re-release of Top Gun.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000129/","name":"Tom Cruise","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000534/","name":"Kelly McGillis"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001716/","name":"Tony Scott"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0143596/","name":"Jim Cash","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0258390/","name":"Jack Epps Jr.","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1274594/","name":"Ehud Yonay"],"duration":"PT1H50M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Paranormal Witness: With Gillian English, Frances Townend, Daniel Cannis, Colin Murphy. A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1874066/","name":"Paranormal Witness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTZkZTQxZTEtN2VjYi00ZDg3LTlkZDAtMWIzMGNjODcwMzE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY0NzcxNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A true horror documentary series which brings to life the stories of people who have lived through paranormal experiences that defy explanation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1874066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dsaillant811"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrifying","reviewBody":"This is one of the freakiest shows on TV, but before watching it, you need to know what you're getting into. This show DOES NOT try to prove or disprove the paranormal. Nor are the stories even slightly realistic. When you realize that, you will appreciate the show much more. I really don't like the 2-story episodes of season 1. Season 2 is a lot better. Season 2 is all-around stronger, better, and scarier. There are plenty of jump scenes and loads of suspense. This is probably the best "Haunted Documentary" style show on TV. Some episodes are just pure junk, but the "Man in the Attic," "Capitol Theater Haunting," and "The Dybbuk Box" are by far the freakiest and most jumpy episodes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"genre":["Documentary","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-09-07","keywords":"haunting,poltergeist,two word title,eyewitness account,documentary series","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7025791/","name":"Gillian English"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3266807/","name":"Frances Townend"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3141457/","name":"Daniel Cannis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0178419/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Paranormal Witness","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3941252377","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGVkMWY4N2YtM2Y2Zi00OGRiLTkwNDUtOWIxZWM4ZDdkMGY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Paranormal Witness"}}</script><metacontent="

I really don't like the 2-story episodes of season 1. Season 2 is a lot better. Season 2 is all-around stronger, better, and scarier. There are plenty of jump scenes and loads of suspense. This is probably the best "Haunted Documentary" style show on TV. The crew of spaceship begin to die because of unknown defect in a virtual reality device." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1219836/","name":"Virtuality","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmRjNWU3OWYtYzk5My00NGNjLWE3OGItNDQ0OWJkMjNmMGJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTg2NjYzOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The crew of spaceship begin to die because of unknown defect in a virtual reality device.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1219836/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"One big confusion","reviewBody":"This film is about the twelve astronauts who are on a spacecraft, going to a distant star that takes ten years to arrive. On board, things start to go wrong and yet they cannot turn back.

"Virtuality" seems good on paper. It is directed by a famous director, has several known (but not very famous) stars, and an intriguing plot. However, it does not seem to work well. The story might have been interesting, but the delivery of the plot is very confusing. There are many mystifying events on board the spacecraft, and these events are not explained well. I was hoping that the ending would bring some answers, but it brings even more unanswered questions. All the confusion annoys rather than being thought stimulating. 

In addition, the film fails to grip viewers or to provide suspense for viewers to beg for me. "Virtuality" is a disappointingly confusing film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4144,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2009-06-26","keywords":"outer space,wheelchair,virtual reality simulation,reference to virtual reality,virtual world","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0182666/","name":"Nikolaj Coster-Waldau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2628935/","name":"Kerry Bishé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0117146/","name":"Joy Bryant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000916/","name":"Peter Berg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000534/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0306639/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852899/","name":"Michael Taylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601822/","name":"Ronald D. programme.title: San Andreas Mega Quake
programme.desc: Jeanie Miller, Rodney McKays Schwester, wird aus ihrem Haus in Vancouver entführt. McKay, Sheppard and Ronon machen sich sofort auf den Weg zur Erde, um sie zu suchen. Dr. McKay stellt schnell fest, dass offenbar Jeanies Computer angezapft wurde, und verfolgt diese Spur bis zu einem Bürogebäude, ohne sich von Sheppard und Ronon absichern zu lassen. Prompt erweist sich die Spur als eine Falle: Der Industrielle Henry Wallace kidnappt McKay und will ihn zwingen, seine todkranke Tochter zu retten.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Picard erlebt noch immer wilde Zeitsprünge, die er nicht beeinflussen kann. Von Q erfährt er, dass die gesamte Menschheit gefährdet ist und unterzugehen droht. Um dies zu verhindern, muss Picard ein bestimmtes Ereignis in der Zukunft verhindern.

programme.title: U Pana Boga za piecem
U Pana Boga za piecem
programme.desc: U Pana Boga za piecem: Directed by Jacek Bromski. With Jan Wieczorkowski, Krzysztof Dzierma, Andrzej Beja-Zaborski, Anna Yanovskaya. Russian woman is robbed after crossing Polish border and has to wait until the local policemen catch the thieves. The priest, who is the main authority in the town, orders that she stays at organist's house." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0178031/","name":"U Pana Boga za piecem","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjVjNjJmM2MtZWRjOC00MjNjLWJkNjctNzhlNTY4NTI4MThlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Russian woman is robbed after crossing Polish border and has to wait until the local policemen catch the thieves. The priest, who is the main authority in the town, orders that she stays at organist's house.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0178031/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Witold"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"an unusual and quite original comedy","reviewBody":"The action takes place in a little town in Poland close to the border with Belarus. The Soviets tried for a long time to persuade their citizens and others that Soviet = Russian. This has been believed to some extent in the neighboring countries - what makes the life of the main heroine Marusia more difficult; some people in Poland call her "Russian". Highway bandits have robbed her money, but Marusia gets help from an unexpected ad hoc conglomerate: a local Catholic priest (admirable monologues which are actually prayers to St. Mary asking for guidance), a local police chief (subject to human weaknesses but brave when it really counts) and a young organist. The priest has an agenda of his own but he does not announce it aloud, not even in his prayers to St. Mary. \n\nIra Laczina received a prize for her role as Marusia at the Gdynia Film Festival.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1006,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"1998-11-13","keywords":"village priest,stallholder,see through,nightgown,singing","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0927251/","name":"Jan Wieczorkowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0246198/","name":"Krzysztof Dzierma"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0067329/","name":"Andrzej Beja-Zaborski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0111369/","name":"Jacek Bromski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092592/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013835/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049230/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0158582/","name":"Tadeusz Chmielewski"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="
